story:
Hello internet!

I have a huge favor to ask of you.

My name is Bethany Francis, or BFranSass… whichever you'd prefer

And I am a yoga teacher!

I have my yoga certification through the international yoga alliance,

and nothing brings me greater joy than sharing the gift of yoga with others.

So, after creepin on youtube for a….fair..amount of time,

I realized there wasn't really a weekly yoga vlog

you know with sequences and teaching about philosophy of yoga itself,

and then i was like,

I COULD DO THAT! 

And that made me both excited and terrified.

So what I'm doing is making a youtube channel where I'll post 2 videos a week -

One, with a yoga sequence,

So if you can't afford dropping into a class at your local yoga studio-

which I highly recommend, 'cause there's nothing like a yoga class

where you're there..with people... adjusting you

Or if you're feeling anti-social and just want to do yoga in the privacy of your own home until you feel less self-conscious-

judgment-free!

Or even if you're like "what is yoga?" or, like,  "yoga..isn't that for like, skinny...vegan.. white actresses?"

You'll have bi-weekly webisodes to teach you about yoga and going through the asanas (the poses) - and learn that yoga isn't just for skinny..vegan..women, 

but like bell hooks said of feminism, 

Yoga is for everyone!

So in order for me to do this,

I need to get a proper digital camera -

Cause the one I have on my mac is kinda fuzzy and I want you to be able to really see me working through the poses so it's easier for..you

I'm looking to buy a 3rd Generation Flip UltraHD Video Camera,

A Tripod for that camera, so I can film myself 

And a cheap (cheap!) version of Final Cut Pro to edit the videos so I can put them on the internet.

Now you may be thinking,

"What do I get out of this?"

To which, skeptical potential donor,

 I reply,

"Bethany teaching you hours of free yoga that will forever be on the internet so you can take class whenever you want!"

And also

dare I say, offer, 

"inner peace?!"

 I know, it's crazy!

So yes… with all costs considered, the amount is about $500 - which, being a recent college graduate who studied theatre and women's studies in this economy..

I just don't have that kind of money right now to be teaching free yoga 

so your investment in me would be greatly appreciated!

I love you SO MUCH and cannot thank you enough for your generosity!

And I'll see you when you see me! 

Namaste.

[Psst! If I get enough money you'll learn what namaste actually means!]

Byeee thoughhhhh!

[edit: the part where I mention "white vegan actress," I am laughing at myself. ;)]

story:
Jeremy needs your help!

 

Berkeley County resident Jeremy Wright, and his daughter were flown to Inova Fairfax Hospital in Falls Church, Va., after a head-on collision, which occurred at about 8 p.m. on Airport Road May 16, 2012.


A fractured hip, abdominal injuries including a severed colon, his small intestine was torn in two places resulting in Jeremy having to wear a colostomy bag. He also suffered a severely broken right wrist that required three surgeries to repair as well as two pins placed in his right wrist. Jeremy has made numerous trips back and forth to Inova Fairfax hospital in which his most recent resulted in another hospital stay due to infection in his right wrist. Throughout all of this Jeremy remains strong and in good spirits but he still needs your help.

The money that you contribute to Jeremy will be used for Jeremy's medical bills, his home healthcare nurse, physical therapy, travel expenses back and forth to doctor's for appointments, and anything else medically related to Jeremy's recovery.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kiana Dabier and I am a senior studying Public Health with an emphasis in Health Promotion at Brigham Young University. 

Haiti is still greatly suffering from the devastation of the earthquake in 2010. Hospitals, homes, and lives were destroyed and have still not recovered. 

In a couple of weeks I have the opportunity to go to Leogane, Haiti and educate the community about: the body systems, HIV/AIDS, cholera, first aide, women's health, and prenatal-care.

Sustain Haiti's  mission is to eventually make the people of Haiti completely independent of outside help to be able to meet their own needs. We will do this by educating them.

Sustain Haiti is indeed a registered 501(c)(3) in the United States. Unfortunately, IndieGoGo has not entered it in it's systems. However, here is it's EIN #: 

EIN: 27-4017534

What We Need & What You Get

 I have already raised, and/or paid for a little over half of the program cost, however, I still need $1,200. And here is what it will be used for:

Cost of living and food: $1000

In-Country Transportation: $200

Sustain Haiti is a Non-profit 501c3, meaning that all donations are tax-deductible!

All donations are GREATLY appreciated and below you can see what I will do for you when you give money!

If I don't reach my entire goal I will still use the money I did raise to go to Haiti this summer. If by some freak accident, I do not end up being able to go, I will refund your money!

The Impact

By donating money to send me to Haiti, I pledge to exhaust my knowledge and time to helping the communities in Haiti become self-reliant so that they can flourish independently and have a higher quality of life.

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate your time spent checking out my cause, but if you cannot make a donation at this time and you still want to help, there are other ways!

Share my page on Facebook, Twitter, and/or any other social media platforms!

Email those you think would be interested in donating to my cause!

Contact me for other ways to help via email: ktdabier@gmail.com

"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime".

story:
More Than a Bottle Opener.

Beautifully polished, aluminum alloy twist top bottle opener. TwistedTags are custom engraved to your design.

We make TwistedTags in-house in our state of the art CNC machinery. We can't wait to see what backers choose to get engraved. We'll be featuring the most creative ideas in future updates so please leave your ideas on our comments page!

We're really proud of this design. With the help of the indiegogo community, we're hoping to share these with as many people as possible.

 

 

What are we doing here?

We need to make as many as possible to get our production costs down to a resonable level. If we are making these 10 at a time, they just become too expensive to produce. The automated machinery we use for TwistedTags can take all day just to setup so we need to have bulk orders to make it worth while.

With $800 we can start advertising online to sell TwistedTags worldwide.

If we get funded up to $2,200 we can get a 30% discount on the 60mm Aluminum billets. This means we can make even more at a better price.

With $3,800 we can improve our manufacturing process with automated parts loading equipment so we can make more TwistedTags much faster. 

 

Can you help us?

If your able to back us then that's great and we'll try make it worth your while. If you can't though then please consider sharing this page with a friend. We would be forever greatful! Also if you've got any suggestions for us for TwistedTags then please leave us a comment or have a chat with us on twitter.

 

Thanks to everyone for stopping by.

 

Rick O'Connor & Lachlan Grogan.

story:
Short Summary

The Faith Challenge

The Faith Challenge

As I am writing this I haven’t solved the eternal question of Faith being it coming of a Christian, Muslim or atheistic. I can with certainly say that Faith isn’t the easiest, and most mist understood thing in the world, wars being fought over it, people killed and a general arguing point like the one between me and my atheist friend who challenged me to do this

A few weeks ago I started  the campaign to raise funds for The Faith challenge taking a jetski and motorbike across Europe and Africa as the only transport doing equal  amount of km on each 14000km in total .I wasn’t going to spread any religions ,just see what need is there ,make a documentary  ,daily Facebook and Twitter updates ,take nice photos and show it to the world, and help a few people with funding as I proceeded. I asked a lot of my friends to help me; I do have a lot of friends Christians and atheist. as we continued into the final  stages of the project a few things happened ,I saw people that wanted to help and give support ,and then I saw what my friend called paper Facebook Christians ,Muslims and atheist as we have space on our campaign for all the above challenging each other to a small amount and reposting it and nominating a friend to a donation ,I must say we have 40 days left and I am shocked as I was browsing and checking out religion pages the amount off likes and the fighting that goes on in the comment columns .it is true what he said that Christian on Face book post nice stuff but they will not contribute ,Muslims  like to fight for their religion and don’t donate, they are really passionate and I respect them for that ,Atheist they like to prove we are wrong ,but won’t put their money where their mouths is .I am attacking nobody and I am just very grateful for the lesson I have learnt out off this ,I am fasting for 30 days now ,hunger isn’t easy and that the Lord has given me the Faith In Him and if I had to put my Faith in the world I would be in deep trouble .I have asked hundreds of people to join ,asked  Religious pages to post my link ,they have ignored me I am taking it on the chin I may not succeed in the Faith challenge ,but I have learned one thing ,Faith is one priceless thing

You can do what you want with this post like it, share it I have made my peace and Faith won ,here is the link to indiegogo  #indiegogo http://t.co/tY46a4fYK0


Ps. If we raise more than the  target we can buy more jetski and bikes and invite people on the trip with us

story:
Yarmouk Camp Residents Starving to Death

It is estimated that around 9 million people in Syria are suffering as you read this.  Seven million are in urgent need of humanitarian aid inside Syria, which includes 18,000 who live in the Yarmouk Refugee Camp.  The civilians inside Yarmouk are in most urgent need of the aid, therefore, this campaign focuses specifically on Yarmouk.

Yarmouk Camp once peacefully housed 160,000 displaced residents from Palestine, but is now under siege, leaving people to literally and intentionally starve to death by the warring parties.  Their situation has been described as the worst refugee crisis of our generation. 

Food aid has been slowly trickling into Yarmouk since January 18, 2013, which is "just a drop in the ocean compared with need," according to a United Nations spokesperson.

I was inspired to come up with a campaign to help raise funds for the besieged people of Yarmouk, specifically after I learned about the inhumane death of little Isra al-Masri (the emaciated toddler pictured below and in the clips). 

I want Isra's family to know that the starvation death of their beautiful and innocent daughter was not in vain. 

It's too late for little Isra (may she rest in peace), but not for the thousands of others who are pleading and praying for help, including the innocent starving children you just saw in the video clips above.  You don't need to understand their language to know what they are trying to communicate to the world. Their message is loud and clear: THEY ARE HUNGRY. Their desires and cravings are simple: they want bread, milk and rice.

Just listen to this 14-year old boy describe the desperate need for food:

When the gaunt figure who was once a healthy man with dignity pictured below was asked when was the last time he ate, he said he could not recall as it was a long time ago...

Human Rights Watch: Food as a Weapon of War

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D5NE6E64ImA

Noam Chomsky and many other prominent figures have chosen to fast (go without food) for one day, in solidarity with the Syrian victims of this harsh and barbaric starvation war.  For how long can you, can I, go without food?

Here's where you and I CAN make a difference...

We have the power to transform their lives by saving them and restoring their faith in our humanity. 

Based on my research, the most successful organization that can effectively deliver basic but life-saving food parcels is the agency known as UNRWA (United Nations Relief and Works Agency).  UNRWA also has an affiliate partner here in the U.S., called American Friends of UNRWA.  Here is some additional information about UNRWA and American Friends of UNRWA for your reference. 

http://www.unrwa.org/what-we-do

http://www.unrwausa.org/mission

American Friends of UNRWA will be the beneficiary of all funds raised through this campaign (minus Indiegogo's fees).

I am asking you to please donate!

A present-day holocaust is being committed against an innocent civilian population before our very eyes. For how much longer will the world turn a blind eye?

Your Impact

The impact of your donation will be significant:

  • $1350 provides an emergency health kit
  • $235 provides water for hundreds
  • $200 provides stoves for 4 families
  • $100 provides fuel for 1 family for 1 month
  • $40 provides a doctor for 1 day
  • $34 provides food for 1 family for 10 says
  • $3.40 provides food for 1 family for 1 day
  • Other amount $ (you decide) __________

Please Donate!

Success Story

According to an article in The Guardian, "This tragedy has a human face. Khaled, aged 14 months, is a war child. Trapped with his parents and four siblings, he has seen more suffering in his short life than most of us will experience in a lifetime. Khaled was lucky, as he was successfully treated for a severe form of malnutrition known as kwashiorkior.  He was also treated for symptoms of rickets."

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kwashiorkor

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rickets

It took just one month to transform baby Khaled to a now almost-normal and healthy baby boy, thanks to the work of UNRWA and American Friends of UNRWA!

Please donate so that you may help these agencies save other babies and children like Khaled.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, and I understand that. Every act of goodness is charity (Prophet Muhammad pbuh) though, so please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign: Save Yarmouk Concentration Camp Today.

Thank you!

~<3~

story:
We invented a material for fast hair growth by chance ensuring hair regrowth appearance in just five days. The material is designed as cosmetics and acquired special cosmetics qualification in China. For the material’s hair regrowth function, we have already applied for the patent in China, United States, European Union and Japan.

Androgenetic alopeciais a problem which 50% men and 10% women will be faced. Aging process faced by each person could initiate with hair loss for some people. Same with aging, hair loss is also a difficult medical problem. Our hair regrowth invention (US2015/0004254A1) has potential to thoroughly solve hair loss problem, and are likely to offer a cure idea for other complicated diseases. Our products are put on the market as special cosmetics in China (similar to Quasi-Drug Label in Japan), but special cosmetics cannot be advertised as a drug for treating hair loss problem, so the product won’t be known by customers or recognized by doctors even it can solve the problem of hair loss. That’s the reason we decide to apply to the FDA for investigational new drug (IND) and new drug applications (NDA).

Why Do We Want Crowdfunding?

About two out of ten Chinese adult males experience hair loss, while about one out of twenty adult women does. Therefore in China it is estimated that there are 65 million men and 15 million women are suffering hair loss. In the United States about four out of seven adult males are suffering hair loss.

There are an estimated 40 million men and 12 million women experiencing some degree of hair loss in the United States alone. Two-thirds of American men will see the affects of Androgenetic alopecia by the age of 35.

In order to meet such a large market demand, we decided to launch this crowdfunding.

The crowdfunding will be used for the production, while the rest of the money will be used for preclinical study, phase I clinical research and application to the FDA for clinical tests.

The cost of FDA application for preclinical trials and phase I clinical study is estimated as $2 million. We will raise funds by crowdfunding and fill the gap by other means.

Reasons for Androgenetic Alopecia

Male hormone translates into DHT which will block the hair follicle regeneration. DHT can make obstacles in the process of hair follicle stem cells translating into hair follicle cells, preventing hair follicle regeneration, thus regenerated hair follicles keep shrinking until disappear.

The study found that hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area are normal, so hair follicle stem cells loss is not the main cause of hair loss (learn more about the study).

There are two possible ways of DHT blocking hair follicle regeneration process: 1. DHT leads to the hyperplasia and enlargement of sebaceous gland near the top of  head, as with DHT leads to the prostate enlargement of male, which squeezes the survival space of the hair follicles, therefore stopping hair follicle regeneration after normal falling off; 2. After the cycle of hair follicle anagen, catagen and telogen, the body will give hair follicle stem cells the right stimulation signal, initiating the hair follicle stem cells regeneration process but DHT accumulation interferes or disrupts the signal transmission, thus blocking the regeneration process of hair follicle stem cells differentiating into hair follicle cells.

Both two ways lead to the same result: sebaceous gland cells encroach on the space of hair follicles, thus hair loss area is not only very oily (that’s why every hair loser has this problem), and making hair follicle regeneration lose physical space and more difficult.

Androgenetic Alopecia Treatment Difficulties

1. How to make physical space for hair follicles. The long process of hair loss with hair follicles falling off, and sebaceous glands cells gradually occupy the space of the hair follicle. The simple physical logic tells us that physical space must be made for hair follicle for its regeneration. If see some effective hair regrowth technologies, such as hair transplant surgery, you will find the most simple idea of providing specific space for hair follicle is man-made wound.

The study found that man-made wound healing process will produce new hair follicle stem cells group and new hair (learn more about the study).

From hair transplant surgery we will find that hair follicles in transplantation area can regenerate after being removed. But in the hair loss area, making new pores and transplanting new hair follicles which all fall off after 3 months. The regenerated hair follicles in hair loss area should have nothing to do with transplanted hair follicles. The man-made bigger wound for new pore is the key to regenerate hair follicles in hair transplant surgery.

Talents of Chinese people with traditional Chinese medicine experience and exploration also provide an effective way of hair regrowth. That is using plum needle to knock on the head. Almost all Chinese medicine hair regrowth shops, no matter what kind of Chinese traditional medicine they choose use plum needle head knocking as supplementary means. In fact, knocking on the head with plum needle is the only solution of hair regrowth that might work. Because plum needle which knocking on the hair loss area can make a lot of wounds. Even without stem cells stimulation, it may also be accompanied by new hair follicle regeneration during the wounds heal.

2. How to initiate hair follicles regeneration by hair follicle stem cells. Modern medicines generally use cytokines to stimulate stem cell regeneration process. The special stem cells need special cytokines to stimulate them. But now there is no broad spectrum stimulating factor being found.

How Does WanBinCell work?

WanBinCell initiative in situ tissue regeneration technology is to cure hair loss by aiming at the two difficulties of Androgenetic alopecia treatment, and is able to cure quickly and keep a long-term health.

In situ tissue regeneration technology is to initiate body’s original stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation by external physical or chemical means, thus fulfill regeneration of new healthy tissues.

In Situ Tissue Regeneration Technology

Our patent provides a method of initiating mammal’s stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation. This method can persistently initiate in situ stem cells proliferation, migration and differentiation with minimal or no side effects. We have not only developed the theory of “in situ tissue regeneration”, but also invented the method which can timely initiate tissue regeneration of stem cells near damaged tissues, so as to cure the disease or restore young tissues. (learn more about the in situ tissue regeneration technology patent).

Mechanism

Drugs(stem cell initiators) are used on the targeted aging or damage tissues. Stem cell initiators will initiate healthy tissue regeneration of stem cells through three functions: 1. Stem cell initiators remove damaged or senescent cells, and make specific space for tissue regeneration; 2. Stem cell initiators as exogenous gas signal molecule activate stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation; 3. Stem cell initiators regulate the immune response, to avoid infection. Under the induce of specific space, damaged tissues or surrounded normal stem cells regenerate new functional young tissues through proliferation, migration and differentiation. Impaired cells are removed as making room for tissue regeneration. Disease is cured and young tissues are restored by new tissues replacing impaired ones.

Further studies have indicated that stem cell initiator is a substance similar to ROS. Targeted drug delivery is equivalent to supplement exogenous similar ROS compounds into the target tissue. The latest study has found that improving the level of ROS could accelerate apoptosis of cancer cells and reach the goal of anticancer（For example:1. Targeting Oxidative Stress in Embryonal Rhabdomyosarcoma; 2. Antioxidants Accelerate Lung Cancer Progression in Mice; 3. Selective killing of cancer cells with a small molecule targeting stress response to ROS; 4. Breaking the depth dependency of phototherapy with Cerenkov radiation and low-radiance-responsive nanophotosensitizers.）; improving ROS could regulate immune response and treat autoimmune diseases(For example: 1. A New Arthritis Therapy with Oxidative Burst Inducers; 2. Eriocalyxin B ameliorates experimental autoimmune ncephalomyelitis by suppressing Th1 and Th17 cells.); increasing ROS level contributes to tissue regeneration(For example: 1. Amputation-induced reactive oxygen species are required for successful Xenopus tadpole tail regeneration; 2. Sustained production of ROS triggers compensatory proliferation and is required for regeneration to proceed). The three patents we applied cover three possible mechanisms of ROS, suggesting that the substance which similar to ROS can play the same role of ROS. We applied apoptosis inducer patent for substance similar to ROS (learn more about apoptosis inducer patent) used for anti-aging and tumor treatment.

Advantages of In Situ Tissue Regeneration Technology

It is a kind of stem cell therapy which makes full use of stem cell regeneration ability; Stem cells can be found in any tissue, so we can initiate in situ stem cells with no need of transplant; No need of complicated process of selection and induction; Make full use of original stem cell micro environment; No carcinogenicity and won’t cause immune rejection; Simple, high success rate, widely used, low cost and convenient.

How Does WanBinCell Hair-Growth-Promoting Solution Regrow Hair?

WanBinCell contains the substance which can activate the hair follicle stem cells to regenerate, having two key functions in the process of hair regrowth: 1. Make tiny wounds thus providing specific space for new hair follicles; 2. activate hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area and grow new healthy hair follicles.

Through experiment, WanBinCell has the following characteristics: regrow new hair in about 5 days; in half bald area, fierce hair loss period shall appear by the accelerated falling off (the severe shedding period )of original hair especially the thin ones, then new hair regrow; in bald area, new hair regrowth takes a longer time of about 1 to 3 months; no matter what the degree of hair loss is, WanBinCell shall be used for more than over one year to make sure of no hair loss appearance.

What Does WanBinCell Bring to the World?

In situ tissue regeneration technique has made a great breakthrough in traditional stem cell therapy. It can be applied as a clinical therapy immediately. It makes full use of the potential of stem cell regeneration which could cure many difficult diseases. Combined with apoptosis inducer patent technology, it is more powerful in anti-aging and cancer treatment.

Compare

There are three well-known solutions for Androgenetic alopecia: Finasteride, Minoxidil and Hair Transplant Surgery.

Case 

In this video, our case studies include hair regrowth, alopecia areata, psoriasis, Vitiligo (Hair regrowth and in situ tissue regeneration  cases).

Perks

All PERKs will start being mailed within one month after receipt of your perk contribution.

When you receive this perk, and start using it, we encourage anyone using photos to record the excitement of hair regeneration. If you are not satisfied with WanBinCell results when you run out of WanBinCell follow the instructions, and want your contribution back, we will refund the remaining contribution for you after deducting the cost ($ 25) and 10% expenses. You only need to do the following steps: 1. take 3 picture at least to record using the WanBinCell program, including before using, during using and after using; 2. send all photos to wanbincell@wbcell.com; 3. describe your requirements and views in the message.

FAQ

Why WanBinCell Works So Quickly?

New hair can regrow in about 5 days in half bald area. This is because WanBinCell contains stem cell initiators factors. They penetrate scalp, reach hair follicle stem cells, and stimulate the stem cells to grow new hair follicles. Wound will heal in 5 days, with the factors, new hair follicles could regeneration 5 days. In half bald area, hair follicles and their living space still exist, therefore new hair follicles have space to grow quickly.

Why It has Slower Effect in Bald Area?

In bald area, there are almost no hair follicles; their space has been taken up by sebaceous gland cells. Even there are stem cell regeneration stimulate factors, it is impossible to have regenerated hair follicles because of the limited physical space. So it works slowly in bald area. But by continuously creating man-made micro wounds, hair follicles will have physical space for survival. Generally in 1 to 3 months, healthy thick new hair can regrow even in bald area.

Why Have Severe Shedding Period? Can it Be Avoided?

Physical space is still the key point to solve the problem of Androgenetic alopecia. Because there are limited physical space and old hair follicles have not been cleared, new hair follicles could not regenerate. Natural regeneration of hair follicles is a process that new hair follicles replace old hair follicles which are in telogen. In fact, severe Shedding of hair exists in all effective products, such as Minoxidil and Finasteride. In the first 3 months after an effective hair transplant surgery, hairs grow from new transplant hair follicles will fall off entirely. Now it is inevitable and must be accepted. This period also has psychological impact. Different from transplant surgery, using WanBinCell does not need to shave all the old hair. Shedding period especially long hair fall off give shocks, while new hair grow in the speed of 1mm/3 days.

How Woman Avoid Severe Shedding Period?

Due to woman’s hair loss generally is not as serious as man, we recommend you to use plum needle and reduce the use time of WanBinCell. For example use WanBinCell for one week (7 days), select one day from this week to knock head with plum needle, then stop for a week, and keep doing it. Even men can use this method to avoid Shedding period. For men who can accept the period, using plum needle once a week is also helpful.

Severe Shedding Periods Due to Hair Being Burned off?

Because of the need to make tiny wounds, WanBinCell has a little corrosion effect. Corrosion effect is similar to hydrogen peroxide used in dyeing, but won’t burn out the hair for the following reasons: 1. If WanBinCell burns off hair, new hair won’t appear when using it. Even new hairs appear, it will not continue to grow. If you use it for 20 days, new hair can grow in 5 days, and generally reach 0.5 cm at 20th day; 2. If hair is burned off, it should not carry hair follicle, while actually most of the hairs fall off with hair follicles thicker than hair; 3. If it burns off hair, the original hair will grow naturally. It’s impossible to have a lot of new hair grow when stop using WanBinCell for 1 to 2 months. The truth is after using WanBinCell for 20 days, then stop, new hair will grow unceasingly after 1 to 2 month.

Why Hair Regrowth Takes Such a Long Time?

It has been found that it takes about 1 to 2 years to recover to no hair loss appearance by using WanBinCell. Since WanBinCell do not require continuous use, the overall use time is about 1 year. Hair regrowth is a big challenge. Before our in situ tissue regeneration technology, hair transplant surgery, as an effective means, requires more than six months to achieve hair regrowth. The first 3 months is shedding period and other 3 months growing period. Actually it takes 8 months for hair to grow in all transplant area. Our in situ tissue regeneration technology solves two hair loss problems: create hair follicle regeneration space and stimulate hair follicle stem cells to regenerate hair follicles. Even so, as an aging problem, hair loss cannot be solved in 1 to 2 months. In the consideration of hair loss usually lasting time of 5 to 10 years and hair loss area are completely different from healthy area, it is reasonable to rebuild a new healthy in 1-2 years.

Are Other Drugs Needed when Using WanBinCell?

WanBinCell can fully solve hair loss from essential problem. Long-term use can cure hair loss. Therefore it’s not recommended to use other drugs together, but we suggest to use plum needle. If used properly, it is quite beneficial to hair (for example, knocking as heavily as possible to make scalp bleed if pain could be tolerated).

What Advantages of Using Plum Needle?

One difficulty of Androgenetic alopecia treatment is how to provide physical space for the generation of new hair follicles. Although WanBinCell can make tiny wounds, but the size and number of wounds could not reach the requirements of fast hair regrowth. We have learned that man-made large wounds of hair transplant surgery can theoretically accelerate hair follicle regeneration process. So when knocking head with plum needle, we suggest that if you can tolerate, please knock as heavily as possible and make scalp bleed. There is no need to worry about the infection of wounds, because WanBinCell contains a substance similar to the ROS, a material could avoid infection and accelerate wound healing.

Is WanBinCell Safe?

WanBinCell had been inspected by qualified inspection agency, conforming to the safety specifications, and is a special cosmetic product examined and approved by State Food and Drug Administration of China. Actually we have done a more rigorous safety testing, therefore we can confirm that WanBinCell can be taken orally or by intramuscular injection without any side effects (watch the video of the inventor test WanBinCell safety on himself).

Why Using WanBinCell could Cause Piercing Pain? Is It Unqualified As Cosmetics?

Having no space for the new hair follicle is the key problem of hair loss. So solving the problem of hair loss must create space for new hair follicles. It’s a logical thinking that WanBinCell use chemicals to create tiny wounds. Wounds will naturally bring pain which shouldn’t be thought as a standard to judge for good cosmetics. In the United States, WanBinCell has to be put on the market as a medicine. We have applied for a patent in the United States. Piercing pain is an important mechanism process of medicine, rather than side effect.

Why Need 1-2 Years to Get Fully Recovery?

Androgenetic alopecia is one of the forms of aging, which develops relatively slow, generally obvious hair loss takes five to ten years to appear. It has long disease course and treatment time. There is still no very effective treatment for Androgenetic alopecia except hair transplant surgery with relatively fast effect (recovery also needs about 8 months), Minoxidil and Finasteride need longer time to take effect, and need to be applied for a long time. Comparatively speaking, WanBinCell technology is also the most rapid one by only taking 1-2 years to recover.

Development

About the Inventor

Xuewu Liu, Chinese, in 1998, bachelor of Nanjing University majoring in atmospheric physics and atmospheric environment. Liu has graduated from Nanjing University with a master of international business economics in 2001 and have worked in government department, financial institutions and private investment company. With high scientific literacy and innovation ability, Liu has bright ideas and thoughts in fields of economy and enterprise management. He is the inventor and applicant of this patent. He has invented three patents by doing experiments on himself, which are hair regrowth technology, in situ tissue regeneration technology and apoptosis inducer technology.

Liu believe that medicine will enable remarkable treatment techniques, if only we are able to break our thinking out of its traditional box. 

Risk

WanBinCell is a special cosmetic product approved by China’s State Food and Drug Administration, not medicine. We may encounter some challenges when applying to FDA for clinical trials, for example, most of our preclinical research will be done in Chinese laboratories, the research material may not be able to meet the requirements of FDA. More experiments will be arranged in American high-standard laboratories depending on the fund could be raised. We will try to find cooperators in the United States, especially big medicine companies experienced in new medicine applications. We hope to gain their support by exchanging our patent technologies.

Help Us Spread the Word About WanBinCell

If you have any idea on media, mailing lists, newsletters, or people who might be interested in sponsorship, partnerships or the like, please email us at liuxuewu@wbcell.com.

Scientists or doctors who are professional in hair regrowth, regenerative medicine, anti-aging and anti-tumor as well as experts who are familiar with new medicine registration process are welcomed to contact us.
story_txt:
We invented a material for fast hair growth by chance ensuring hair regrowth appearance in just five days. The material is designed as cosmetics and acquired special cosmetics qualification in China. For the material’s hair regrowth function, we have already applied for the patent in China, United States, European Union and Japan.Androgenetic alopeciais a problem which 50% men and 10% women will be faced. Aging process faced by each person could initiate with hair loss for some people. Same with aging, hair loss is also a difficult medical problem. Our hair regrowth invention (US2015/0004254A1) has potential to thoroughly solve hair loss problem, and are likely to offer a cure idea for other complicated diseases. Our products are put on the market as special cosmetics in China (similar to Quasi-Drug Label in Japan), but special cosmetics cannot be advertised as a drug for treating hair loss problem, so the product won’t be known by customers or recognized by doctors even it can solve the problem of hair loss. That’s the reason we decide to apply to the FDA for investigational new drug (IND) and new drug applications (NDA).Why Do We Want Crowdfunding?About two out of ten Chinese adult males experience hair loss, while about one out of twenty adult women does. Therefore in China it is estimated that there are 65 million men and 15 million women are suffering hair loss. In the United States about four out of seven adult males are suffering hair loss.There are an estimated 40 million men and 12 million women experiencing some degree of hair loss in the United States alone. Two-thirds of American men will see the affects of Androgenetic alopecia by the age of 35.In order to meet such a large market demand, we decided to launch this crowdfunding.The crowdfunding will be used for the production, while the rest of the money will be used for preclinical study, phase I clinical research and application to the FDA for clinical tests.The cost of FDA application for preclinical trials and phase I clinical study is estimated as $2 million. We will raise funds by crowdfunding and fill the gap by other means.Reasons for Androgenetic AlopeciaMale hormone translates into DHT which will block the hair follicle regeneration. DHT can make obstacles in the process of hair follicle stem cells translating into hair follicle cells, preventing hair follicle regeneration, thus regenerated hair follicles keep shrinking until disappear.The study found that hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area are normal, so hair follicle stem cells loss is not the main cause of hair loss (learn more about the study).There are two possible ways of DHT blocking hair follicle regeneration process: 1. DHT leads to the hyperplasia and enlargement of sebaceous gland near the top of  head, as with DHT leads to the prostate enlargement of male, which squeezes the survival space of the hair follicles, therefore stopping hair follicle regeneration after normal falling off; 2. After the cycle of hair follicle anagen, catagen and telogen, the body will give hair follicle stem cells the right stimulation signal, initiating the hair follicle stem cells regeneration process but DHT accumulation interferes or disrupts the signal transmission, thus blocking the regeneration process of hair follicle stem cells differentiating into hair follicle cells.Both two ways lead to the same result: sebaceous gland cells encroach on the space of hair follicles, thus hair loss area is not only very oily (that’s why every hair loser has this problem), and making hair follicle regeneration lose physical space and more difficult.Androgenetic Alopecia Treatment Difficulties1. How to make physical space for hair follicles. The long process of hair loss with hair follicles falling off, and sebaceous glands cells gradually occupy the space of the hair follicle. We will try to find cooperators in the United States, especially big medicine companies experienced in new medicine applications. We hope to gain their support by exchanging our patent technologies.
Help Us Spread the Word About WanBinCell
If you have any idea on media, mailing lists, newsletters, or people who might be interested in sponsorship, partnerships or the like, please email us at liuxuewu@wbcell.com.
Scientists or doctors who are professional in hair regrowth, regenerative medicine, anti-aging and anti-tumor as well as experts who are familiar with new medicine registration process are welcomed to contact us.

story:
Lucy has a broken Femur.

Lucy was found a few blocks from home and was found injured. Her femur is fractured and will need surgery or amputation. The surgery is costly and so we are asking friends to consider donating a few dollars to help our girl. We would greatly appreciate your help.

Huff Family

story:
ProstaBoost, for men, naturally!

You have prostate problems? You are beginning to age and you are concerned with the health of your prostate? You feel worried about intimate moments and it affects your comfort and self-esteem?

Think for a minute about not having any worries about your prostate, feeling easy about yourself and your intimate desires. Think about sensuous moments without any biological barriers, one of these almost perfect experiences when you are at your best sexually. Wouldn’t that make you happy?


ProstaBoost, simple yet powerful!

ProstaBoost can make it happen for you. Made with natural ingredients (urtica dioica, serenoa repens and lipidium meyenii), added to an antioxidant (lycopene), it will work its power in three ways:

  • improves you sexual health;
  • increases your prostatic functions; and
  • acts as a natural antioxidant.


ProstaBoost, who are we?

Medica Avenue Inc. is a Canadian nutraceutical products company that is dedicated to developing, analyzing, assessing, producing and marketing innovative health products. We are committed to research for new natural health products that are effective and safe, and that deliver what they promise. We only use the purest ingredients from the best suppliers. All of our products have been examined and have received the Health Canada standards approval.                                                   Rock LeBel is the founder and CEO.


ProstaBoost, it works!

ProstaBoost, is the combination you need to:

  • relieve urologic symptoms such as: reduced amount of urine passed, incomplete emptying, nocturnal and diurnal polyuria associated with benign prostatic hyperplasia, moderate or severe;
  • provide your system with antioxidants that help maintaining prostatic health;
  • help you improve the energy and emotional components associated to sexual health. 


You want scientific data?

Scientific data shows that 50% to 60% of men aged 50 or more suffer from benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), a benign increase in size of the prostate. Furthermore, prostate cancer is the second most common type of cancer found in North American men and the second-leading cause of death in men. http://diagnocure.com/docs/news/306.2010-09-21_PCA3_filed_with_the_US_FDA.pdf

The prostate is a gland normally thesize of a walnut that sits over the neck of the bladder. Prostatic difficulties and erectile dysfunction are closely related to testosterone deficiency. While aging, men produce less and less testosterone. In fact, the rate of testosterone production decreases from the age of 30, and then is reduced by 10% per decade. It is therefore important to prevent any condition that may be triggered by taking the appropriate measures consisting of an integrated strategy promoting effective prevention. ProstaBoost is that ounce of prevention that is better than a pound of cure.

Percentage of men suffering from BPH:

  • 30% of men aged 50
  • 50% of men aged 60
  • 80% of men aged 70 and more

As you get older, BPH is more and more prevalent in men. ProstaBoost is the best protection!  (References below)


Let's talk about erectile dysfunction!

Erectile dysfunctions as well as urinary stress incontinence are disorders that seem to be closely related to prostate problems. These problems may have serious negative impacts on self-esteem and intimate relationships. This is why maintaining prostatic health is essential.

Symptoms suggesting that you should use ProstaBoost:

  • Weak urinary stream;
  • Inability to empty the bladder completely;
  • Frequent need to urinate;
  • Unpleasant feeling of heaviness and weight in the rectum or lower abdomen;
  • Frequent need to get up at night to urinate;
  • Frequent difficulty to ejaculate;
  • Erectile dysfunction.


ProstaBoost can do even more!

While protecting your body against prostate malfunction and providing strong natural antioxidants, ProstaBoost can actually prevent severe prostate conditions.

ProstaBoost helps men by preventing prostate problems. Make your life easier and use ProstaBoost. 

It is essentially made with non-chemical ingredients, totally natural and remarkably efficient. Give yourself a chance!


Calendar

Preparation for North American distribution 

May 2015
Sales prospection and business solicitation with chain drugstores for online sales in Canada and the US.
June 2015                                                                                                              
Purchase of base materials and ingredients                                                                        July 2015                                                                                                           
Distribution agreements (chain drugstores, retailers, web)                                    August 2015                                                                                                      
Production, bottling and labelling                                                                             September 2015                                                                                                    
Distribution to clients (start-up supporters, web and distributors)                  
October 2015                                                                                                        
Promotional campaign and publicity                                                                                December 2015                                                                                                              
Begin online sales                                                                                                                    

Start-up fund goal                                                                                                  
450,000$ CND

While protecting your body against prostate

prevent severe prostate conditions.
ProstaBoost helps men by preventing prostate

story:
I was diagnosed over 2 years ago with "Brittle" Type 2 Diabetes with Diabetic Neuropathy and Diabetic Gastroparesis with NO HEALTH INSURANCE QUAILTY OF LIFE IS POOR "Brittle" meaning,

Brittle Diabetes is a subjective term and the diagnosis often depends on the experience of the patient, family and physician involved. The most useful definition of brittle diabetes is a functional one: "the patient whose life is constantly disrupted by episodes of hyper- or hypoglycemia, whatever their cause". While these patients are rare (less than one percent diabetics), they cause a considerable burden on hospital, social, and family resources due to multiple hospital admissions.

Many early studies tried to identify possible physiological mechanisms for the brittleness but with increasing study, it has become clear that the majority of cases are due to psychological factors. Metabolic abnormalities are a rare cause of poor glycemic control.

Brittleness may be in the form of hyperglycemic brittleness, hypoglycemic brittleness or a combination of both. Brittle diabetics followed over a long period of time have been noted to have certain characteristics:

Most patients were consistent in whether their recurrent episodes were hyperglycemic or hypoglycemic in nature. Only occasional patients showing "mixed brittleness".

There is a significant mortality rate. Among survivors, the insulin dose tends to drop over time and episodes of hyperglycemia and severe hypoglycemia become less frequent.

Diabetic complications seem to be more frequent in brittle diabetics and are most likely related to poorer metabolic control.

Type 2 diabetes is a SERIOUS MEDICAL CONDITION that often requires the use of anti-diabetic medication, or insulin to keep blood sugar levels under control. However the development of type 2 diabetes and its side effects (complications) can be prevented if detected and treated at an early stage.

In advanced stages, type 2 diabetes may cause DAMAGE to insulin producing cells in the pancreas, leading to insufficient insulin production such as a "INSULIN PUMP" for your body's needs.

Type 2 diabetes can lead to a greater chance of health problems which could in some cases affect your ability to work and could therefore affect your personal income.

Another factor to bear in mind is that increased care may be needed, from your family or from a carer, particularly as you get older.

With the right support and good diabetes management, the potential negative effects of type 2 diabetes can be minimised.

story:
Short summary

Shining Hope is a charity helping local communities live in harmony with nature and animals. It supports the Shechen clinic and its mobile clinics until 2015. They need an X-Ray machine to treat tuberculosis patients.

The Shechen Medical Centre and Mobile Clinic in Bodhgaya, India, brings free health care to the people of the Bihar region, the poorest state of India. Out of an average of 3000 patients per month, almost 80% of the patients are women and children.

The Mobile Clinic is an effective outreach program that regularly visits 18 villages located between 12 and 60 km from the medical centre and offers free health services to the region’s population of 100,000. Each village is visited twice a month by the medical mobile team (a doctor, a nurse, and a pharmacist). This is their only possibility to receive health care.


What We Need & What You Get

  • The full amount (£9000) is going towards that X-Ray machine.
  • If the goal is not reached a second hand machine will be purchased.
  • Remember, lives will be saved!

The Impact
  • 1000 people die of tuberculosis per day in India, and the disease is spreading. Families are torn apart, treating this disease will give them hope in the most remote village in the Bihar district of India.
  • We have already supported mobile camps for the Dalits caste in India, one of the poorest. This was their only hope to receive health care. Tuberculosis remains a very common disease locally and we could not continue our outreach effort without this machine.


Risks & Challenges
  • 100% of your donation will go towards buying that machine.
  • A generous donor is paying for our admin cost, so if you give £10, £10 will go towards the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can share that campaign, talk about tuberculosis, our luck not to be exposed by this type of disease on our homeland.
  • You can like our Facebook page or follow us on Twitter & Youtube.
  • You can subscribe to our newsletter for more news.

Remember, lives will be saved!



The Impact 
1000 people die of tuberculosis per day in India, and the disease is spreading. Families are torn apart, treating this disease will give them hope in the most remote village in the Bihar district of India.
We have already supported mobile camps for the Dalits caste in India, one of the poorest. This was their only hope to receive health care. Tuberculosis remains a very common disease locally and we could not continue our outreach effort without this machine.

Risks & Challenges
 
100% of your donation will go towards buying that machine.
A generous donor is paying for our admin cost, so if you give £10, £10 will go towards the project. 

  Other Ways You Can Help 
You can share that campaign, talk about tuberculosis, our luck not to be exposed by this type of disease on our homeland.
You can like our Facebook page or follow us on Twitter & Youtube.
You can subscribe to our newsletter for more news.

story:
I am Castillo, a 26 year old transgender man living in Austin, Texas. I started binding my chest when I was 16. Since taking testosterone, I am seen more and more by the world as a man. For the sake of my safety, I do not leave my house without a binder. In concealing my breasts, a binder also makes it difficult to breathe, exercise or stand upright.

Aside from discomfort, having breasts feels so foreign. My chest is off limits. It is like having landmines on your chest that you are constantly being reminded of. Swimming, biking, yoga and weight lifting are all important parts of my stress management routine and not being able to do those things is tough.

I know these things might sounds arbitrary, but ultimately, this surgery would allow for me to feel comfortable. Comfort in the safety of not being “found out” if my breasts become visible. It will give me the comfort of confidently standing in front of a mirror, exercise freely and be touched by my partner.

As a full time student I am not able to pay for this procedure alone. I work part time to afford basic necessities, but saving for this surgery would take me years. 9,000 dollars is an unfathomable amount of money for me right now. Your contribution to my fundraiser, of any amount, would be such a blessing. With a part-time job, bills and school, the money I have raised for this is all being invested in to this fundraising venture.

Last November I came out to my family as a transgender man. My mother and father were both incredibly supportive. I have been lucky enough in my life to have found support from my friends, family, peers and some, employers. While giving a speech at the Trans Day of Remembrance I looked out in to a sea of faces that made my journey realizable. Sitting in that crowd hearing people share their stories of loss and unacceptance made me realize how lucky I have been to have such incredibly supportive people in my life.  As a trans person of color I am the anomaly. Not many trans people of color have similar experiences to my own. We are affected by homelessness, employment discrimination, suicide and violence at disproportionate rates. In knowing that, I couldn’t just fundraise for myself.

The Jim Collins fund raises money to help transgender people receive gender confirming surgeries they wouldn’t otherwise be able to afford.

Learn more at: http://jimcollinsfoundation.org/


Interested in something on the right?

Koozie and T-shirt made using the image above..

Shout out to Leah Kolesky, a very old friend of mine, for the picture.

Calendar

Above is a photo of me with some of my favorite things: Whitney Houston, books about sex and relationships and a goofy face. Sneak peeks of some of the other images from the calendar can be viewed in the gallery.  All of the amazing photos were taken by Erika Nix, a local Austin, TX photographer.

Can’t financially afford to contribute?

Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can help! Please share this with people in your social networks and start having conversations with people about transgenderism. Raising awareness will help make surgeries like this become covered under insurance, make violence rates decrease and help people face less discrimination every day.

story:
What is Global Games?

Global Games will take place on the 19th of July 2014 in Burnaby Canada where the best quidditch players from around the world will go head to head for ultimate bragging rights. Being the furthest away from Canada and the international quidditch community, Australia has a lot to prove. Attending this tournament will help us prove that despite our isolation, we are a force to be reckoned with.

So what is this quidditch you speak of?

Credits to the International Quidditch Association

What We Need?

Determination and hard work can only get the team so far – we need your help to bring our best 21 to Burnaby. With the greatest distance to cover, flight tickets are exorbitantly expensive. Not to mention, these 21 need a place to rest to ensure their best performance on d day. Any amount would be appreciated and would go towards reducing our players travel and accommodation costs.

In Return

In return for your support, we have a range of rewards from having QUAFL’13 MVP James Hyder chauffer you around town for the afternoon, a day filled with quidditch workshops run by members of the team, embroidered headbands to your own customized Team Australia Jersey!


Our very sexy jerseys designed by Melbourne Manticores' talented Kat Young


Adorable T Shirt designed by the Blackburn Basilisks' Scott Cody


More pictures of our headbands will be added soon.

*all merchandise will be ordered once the fundraiser is closed and will be dispatched to you as soon as possible. 

THANK YOU!

On behalf of the AQA and Team Australia, we thank you for your support :)

More about us 

If you have any questions, feel free to email us at admin@quidditch.org.au or visit us on the following pages - 

Facebook
Twitter
Tumblr

story:
About 5 years ago, our friend Bruce (Ian Bruce Martyn), was diagnosed with bone cancer. Discovered during an operation to remedy what the doctors believed to be a hernia,  Bruce in fact had a large cancerous tumour on his pelvis.  

The surgeon was a fellow Kiwi, and following 17 hours of surgery they had removed the tumour and thankfully retained the leg. Unfortunately, due to the partial pelvis removal (also called a hemipelvectomy), the leg can support limited weight and Bruce needs to use crutches for all activities.  

Bruce is one of those rare individuals we meet in our life through chance, crossing paths as we go. I first met Bruce when I came to DeCourcy Island 8 years ago now. Like many people in our lives, he replaced someone in my life that I had lost. Everyone likes Bruce, I am pretty sure he is impossible not to like.

His working career has always been to work with his hands. He is a shipwright, carpenter, electrician, story teller, and adventurer...and if you know Bruce, you would also say he is a pirate - but the good kind we all wished we were as kids.  

Bruce was fortunate enough to survive the bone cancer, but he now faces a different set of hurdles. Financially Bruce has had challenges, particularly when it comes to purchasing adequate crutches. Bruce is trying to remain mobile, and we are making progress in getting him into a workshop where he will once again be able to woodwork and finish the Haven wooden sailboat he was building before the cancer.  

The crutches provided through our medical plan are woefully inadequate for his needs .  They wear out quickly and do not provide Bruce the support he needs in getting around. 

We are asking for your help to buy a pair of Sidestix Boundless PRO forearm crutches.

http://www.sidestix.com/products/forearm-crutches/boundlesspro/


And, if we make it beyond our $950 request, we will use the rest of the funds to buy crutch tips.  The really good ones that last more than a month cost $45 per pair.  

Thank you everyone.

story:
Those of you that know Angel know what a funny, positive, caring, active,
full of life person he is.

Angel unfortunately was in an accident and had to undergo several surgeries
to save his life. In the process his leg had to be amputated.

True to Angel’s faith and his  positive attitude and determination to achieve his
goals, he is very thankful he is alive, and is ready to get to work on his
rehabilitation.

He has a long tough road ahead of him- he still is facing another surgery
before he begins his rehabilitation. His recovery will be very stressful, both
physically and emotionally, the goal of this fundraiser is to alleviate the
financial stress so he can focus on getting better.

Please pass this on to everyone who has had the privilege of Angel being in their
life. If everyone gives even a little, it will really add up.

story:
Short Summary

We (Niccolo, Adam and Madison) are college students with ambitions to make an impact. Through our Maasai friend Kakuta, the representative of the Maasai association (http://www.maasai-association.org), we learned about high rates of respiratory illnesses amongst Maasai women due to traditional cooking methods. Inspired, we began brainstorming on what our personal roles could be in contributing to a solution. After further ideation we contacted friends who have developed innovative stoves to combat this exact problem. To support our philosophy of empowering the local community we decided to provide two different options: a fully solar powered stove, provided by One Earth Designs, and a stove design made with traditional materials yet engineered to optimize efficiency thus reducing emissions, provided by Prakti. Our role in this project is to facilitate setting up the stoves and highlight the connection between their use and the associated health benefits.

What We Need & Why We Need it

As part of integrating ourselves with the community, we will be staying in the Maasai village itself. Due to our ill equipped immune systems we cannot survive on the local diet of the Maasai; $75 a day will provide for food, water, shelter and transportation. Not only is this the most rudimentary way for us to stay here, it also provides an income for the Maasai village. Therefore, the $3500 we ask for will cover most our living expenses while we are there. This does not include our airfare or the cost of purchasing and transporting the stoves. With $3500 dollars and some contributions from our own bank accounts, the three of us will be able to stay there for 13 days; this is the minimum amount of time for us to be able to make an impact. In essence, for every $75 dollars donated one of us will be able to stay for one day.


The Impact we Wish to Achieve

We wish to accomplish three things:

1. Reduce respiratory illnesses amongst Maasai women

2. Have a positive impact on the local natural environment by decreasing the amount of fuel needed while also reducing carbon emissions

3. Create an environment where there is an equal exchange of ideas and information to bring the community closer to solving this pressing issue. i.e. avoid simply introducing the stoves as the BEST option without giving the community a voice.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot directly donate to this cause, the best way for you to help is to share our story by spreading the word.

story:
Just Like You

My name is Kris, and I am 24 years old. I've been happily married to my husband for almost 3 years and am raising two amazing kids. I'm homeschooling my daughter who happens to be autistic. My husband works full time in the aviation industry to support the four of us. When I'm not busting my butt as a parent (doctor/teacher/therapist/crisis manager!) I make and sell custom crochet items in my Etsy shop.


I met my husband when I was in barber school.

Oh - and I also happen to be transgendered. This means that when I was born, people decided I was a girl. I realized something very important at a very young age: I am definitely not a girl. I grew up in an extremely unsupportive environment. Now that that's 100% out of my life, my loving, supportive husband is helping me build myself up and be the real, true me. But we can't do it alone. My husband works full time, but my kids, especially my daughter need me home. The money I make selling my custom crochet items is great for helping to pay our utilities and put a smile on my customers' faces, but that's about it.


Just one of the many items in my shop, a Skyrim-inspired iron helmet.

Why I Especially Need This Surgery

Most of the transgendered men I've met in my life seem to have the partial blessing of having a small chest. They can wear a tight shirt, or a special garment designed to flatten their chest (called a binder) and no one is the wiser. Surgery is still very important for those who seek it, but the reason I want this surgery as SOON as possible is because -

42F. There. I said it. My female body decided to not only screw me over by not being male, but by also having the most enormous breasts possible. They're so big that I have to go to specialty lingerie shops to buy bras in my size, where all that's there is frilly silky girly bras. Talk about insulting. I used to wear a breast binder before I had kids, but I had to stop binding in 2008 because I passed out at work from not being able to breathe and my coworkers had to cut it off of me (Awkward!). My choices are: suffocate or wear big girly gross bras.


When I was pregnant with my oldest child.

This is why it is SO important to me that I get this surgery.

What I Need & What You Get

First and foremost, I'm looking for donations to get my surgery date reserved. Reserving it now means choosing a date months down the road. Funds made in excess of my $1k goal will go towards paying off the surgery. I'm not asking for you to fund the entire thing, as amazing as that would be. I'm willing to bear some responsibility.

I've been explaining my situation to those around me since I was in elementary school, but I'm always willing to educate you on transgender-related things. Of course I don't know everything, and there's no "you've seen one, you've seen 'em all" rule for transgender folk. However, if you ask a trans-related question, I'll be willing to answer it.

I have a decent amount of skill when it comes to crochet, and I love to try new things. My specialty is hats, but I can make mittens, fingerless gloves, scarves.... the possibilities are endless. If you donate to my cause, I'd love to return the favor with a custom crocheted item made just for you.

If I don't reach my goal of $1k, I'm going to put the funds I do get aside and grow it until I can afford the down payment to reserve the surgery date. I won't get the surgery as soon as I'd like, but it'll be the next best thing.

The Impact

One of the worst things about not being able to live as your true gender is that it affects every aspect of your life, from the clothes you wear to what bathroom you use. Every time you look in the mirror, you think about it and your self-esteem takes a hit. Every time you put on a bra, you think about it and your self-esteem takes a hit. Every time you have to use a public restroom, you think about it and your self-esteem takes a hit. 

With this surgery, I can focus more on loving my husband and teaching my beautiful children and shaping them into the next generation. What if - right now, there was a person out there who had the potential to find the cure for cancer, and they're so worried about what they see in the mirror that they can't think? I'm behind the wheel, but I have a hard time keeping my eyes on the road. After this surgery, my life, my family and my self esteem will flourish.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please remember that underneath all the problems LGBT people face, they are first and foremost people. If you donate to my cause, and even if you don't consider donating to The Trevor Project, a cause that helps LGBT youth who have been rejected by their families and live with homelessness and may even be suicidal.

story:
What is the idea and who we are?

The idea of “HealthAssistant” is simple but powerful. Many people are concerned about their health in the future and would like to take a control over disease prevention in their hands. At the same time there is no convenient supportive tool for it at the moment.

The core project team is skilled in different fields like customer solutions creation, marketing strategy, visual design, mobile app and web development:

Oksana - project manager http://ee.linkedin.com/in/oksanatolmatshova/

Janno - app and web developer http://ee.linkedin.com/in/jannolii/

Eveli - UI designer

We have already started the app development!


How will "HealthAssistant" work?

“HealthAssistant” is a smartphone app (for Android phones and iPhone) which creates personalized check-up schedule, discretely reminds at the right time and allows easily contact a doctor. In the future it will be able to suggest you nearest relevant medical institution based on your location.

To ensure high quality of provided information the application will be built on the basis of official and respectful Health organizations' sources.

We respect our future customers’ time and will do our best to provide an intuitive and efficient usage of the app.

All what a person needs to do is to insert his/her own and/or family members' name, birth date and gender

and approve received personalized schedule.

That's it! “HealthAssistant” starts working immediately.

It does not just remind you about scheduled check-ups, it takes care of dismissed ones and gently forces to take actions according to your personal plan.

The user will always have a possibility to see the history of past doctor visits if needed.


How big budget is needed?

We are developing the first iteration of HealthAssistant, which will provide a basic functionality (schedule personalization, reminder system, history tracking). Estimated budget is 15 000 USD.

In the future iteration we will add a search of the nearest location of relevant medical institution and doctor.


When "HealthAssistant "will get ready?

July 2014


Why and how could You support the project?

This is the project with a great value for many people. It will make life a little bit easier and give an opportunity to have a better control of needed health related decisions. If it will be widely used the efficiency of health care could be improved in the world.

You can support the project by

  • Giving the feedback to our idea and providing enhancement advise and

  • Making an affordable contribution

are concerned about their health in the future and would like to take a control over
disease prevention in their hands. At the same time there is no convenient supportive tool
for it at the moment.The core project team is skilled in different fields like customer solutions creation, marketing strategy, visual design, mobile app and web development:Oksana - project manager http://ee.linkedin.com/in/oksanatolmatshova/Janno - app and web developer http://ee.linkedin.com/in/jannolii/Eveli - UI designerWe have already started the app development!

How will "HealthAssistant" work?
“HealthAssistant”
is a smartphone app (for Android phones and iPhone) which creates personalized
check-up schedule, discretely reminds at the right time and allows easily contact a doctor. In the future it will be able to suggest you nearest relevant medical institution based on 
your location.
To ensure
high quality of provided information the application will be built on the basis
of official and respectful Health organizations' sources.
We respect
our future customers’ time and will do our best to provide an intuitive and
efficient usage of the app. All what a person needs to do is to insert his/her own and/or family members' name,
birth date and genderand approve received personalized
schedule.
That's it! “HealthAssistant”
starts working immediately.
It does not
just remind you about scheduled check-ups, it
takes care of dismissed ones and gently forces to take actions according to 
your personal plan.
The user
will always have a possibility to see the history of past doctor visits if
needed.

How big budget is needed?
We are
developing the first iteration of HealthAssistant, which will provide a basic
functionality (schedule personalization, reminder system, history
tracking). Estimated budget is 15 000 USD.
In the future iteration we will add a search of the nearest location of relevant medical institution and doctor.
When "HealthAssistant "will get ready?
July 2014
Why and how could You support the project?
This is the project with a great value for many people. It will make life a little
bit easier and give an opportunity to have a better control of needed health
related decisions. If it will be widely used the efficiency of health care
could be improved in the world.
You can
support the project by

Giving
the feedback to our idea and providing enhancement advise and
Making
an affordable contribution

story:
Short Summary

We are a combination team from all over Queensland, trying to get to represent our state in the QUAFL Cup, the International Quiddicth Association Oceania Regionals.

  • The main teams we consist of are those from James Cook University, Queensland University of Technology, Cairns Champions and University of Queensland
  • We have been represented through the JCU Galleons at the QUAFL Cup but this year we wish to have a broader representation and more players at the Cup
  • We are made of university students and we have little money to spare, any little contribution will be a fantastic help to us all.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $50 per player to play
  • it costs anywhere from $200-600 for a return ticket from anywhere in QLD to Sydney where the QUAFL Cup will be held
  • Will cost $40-70 per jersey for the players. (average being $55)
  • The smallest amount that can be provided to each player to be able to allow them to come to QUAFL
  • If unable to get a billeting option accommodation could cost $90-$400 (average of that being $240)

The Impact

The smallest amount makes a difference. These are the costs for a full squad of 21.

  • $50 per player is charged before we can even play at QUAFL. That is $1050
  • $70 per Jersey all together costs $1470
  • $400 per player for transport adds up to $4800. This is a modest estimate
  • Accommodation could cost anywhere from $1890-$8400, depending what is available to us at the time of QUAFL

Risks & Challenges

If we do not raise enough through this medium, and other efforts we are making, we will not be able to attend. It is that simple.

  • We are making many efforts to raise money and are going to fight tooth and nail to get to QUAFL. Help us get there.
  • This is through BBQs, raffles, bake sales, and the like.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share our campaign around to friends and anyone who you think will help
  • Feel free to contact us about our other fundraising efforts and feel free to help out where possible
  • Just because you can't donate money, doesn't mean you can't help out

Thank you for any and all help on our road to QUAFL!


DISCLAIMER! 

For shipping out side of Australia, you will need to pay a little more, sorry :(

If you choose a custom item, and you want a team's logo, then you will need to gain permission from the team to use it, and prove you have permission before we will proceed with your order. 

The orders for the gear will go through once this campaign is completed, so expect the order to get to you a few weeks after that.

For the cards signed by the entire team, they will be sent after QUAFL. 

For shipping out side of Australia, you will need to pay a little more, sorry :(

story:
Meet Wilson, a 41 year old husband and father who has been paralyzed since last December due to tumors on his spine. 

  • Wilson is our friend and we want to help him recover his life back
  • With your help, you can save this man's life and his family

Before Wilson became paralyzed by the tumors on his spine, he was working hard providing for his family. He is one of the most gentle, humble human beings I have ever met. I still remember the day we were able to take him outside for a few hours from the government hospital. There under a tree sat Wilson in a broken wheelchair, watching the sun set with the biggest smile I have ever seen.  When I asked why Percy his wife wasn't there at the hospital caring for him, I was informed she was three hours away in the village working as a school teacher. She had to work  so she could support them all, sending money to their relatives so they could buy Wilson's medicine and pay for catheters. Percy and Wilson hadn't seen each other in months as they couldn't afford the transportation. The best days for Wilson were when he could hear his wife's voice on the phone.  Right before Wilson became paralyzed, Percy gave birth to a healthy baby girl named Favor. For Percy this meant she was still nursing, caring for their other three children, and working to care via long distance for her paralyzed husband. Percy is a loyal and nurturing wife and mother. 

"And now these three remain: faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love..." 


Wilson needs your help

Here is what we plan to do:

  • We need to raise $25000 to fly Wilson from Africa to India and pay for the surgery he needs to remove the tumors on his spine, and return him safely to Africa for his rehabilitation 

26% Transportation

Flights for Wilson, family member-helper, and Rachael, taxi, car

11% Food/Accommodations/After Care

Wilson’s care extended to guest-house near hospital until Dr.’s say he can return to his home.  (Rachael will assist with Wilson's care once he is stable enough, as she has nursing school background) - The hospital suggested this to reduce costs after his surgery and initial 5-7 day stay in Hospital

52% Surgery

Includes 5-7 day stay in Hospital, food, and nursing care

11% Self-Sufficiency

We want to make sure they have access to clean water and misquote nets.  To us its paramount that we assist Wilson and Percy in obtaining a second income to make up for the one Wilson lost when he became ill and could no longer work.  Whether in a wheel chair or not, Wilson can still support his family!  We are looking into getting them a cow, chickens or goats something that will help them maintain self-sufficiency.   


Donate and / or Share

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • You can tell people you know about our campaign to help save Wilson.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share on your facebook, twitter, and other social media sites


Help us help Wilson

"Thank you for taking the time to visit Wilson's page and if you are able to help in any way, we just want to say thank you from the bottom of our heart!"

Rachael and Ralph

FAQ

Which Hospital will you be using?

We are speaking with several hospitals in India that offer the surgery that Wilson needs for the most reasonable cost and optimal success rate. 

Will Wilson walk again?

Dr.'s have told us the chances of Wilson regaining his ability to walk are better the sooner he can be treated.  They also informed us he needs the tumors removed to decompress his spinal cord to avoid further damage... 

"Jesus said "Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me."
