story:
Hi, my name is Tiha Puaca. I am form Sombor, little town in Serbia. Excuse me for my bad English. I learnt English on my own. Like I said, my husband, son and I are from Serbia. This is small country in Europe. Serbia was in the 90's in a civil war, and in 1999. Serbia was bombed. We still suffer from this time, and we are living in poverty, the state is in chaos and therefore our health care, too.

My husband and I have become parents to our son Sergej in 2008. We were so happy. But after few months our problems have started.  We noticed that our Sergej late in psycho-motor development and he had a drooping eyelids.  It was not noticed by his pediatrician, what is big mistake in her work. Then we started wandering around from one doctor to another (physiatrists, neurologists, pediatricians, geneticists, oncologists, etc.). Over the next three years we went to physical therapy, MRI, scanner, various analyzes, etc. We stayed in hospital a lot, trying to find out what is with my son. Unfortunately all the doctors who saw Sergej did not know what to tell us. They did not know will Sergej ever walk and no one did know what to say about his eyelids. They just said that it is commonly to do a routine operation ptosis after the third year. Now I know it is not routine operation at all. So, after all this physical therapy (when Sergej was 2,5 years old) Sergej started to walk alone. This happiness I will never forget. But, we still don’t know what is wrong with him? MRI, scanner, all analyses …. everything is ok. So, what is wrong with our son? Then we have found another doctor (neurologist) and went to see him. This is the first doctor who said “we need to find out the real reason of his problems”. Finally some doctor said it. He sent us to see genetics doctor. Then we went to genetic doctor. He thinks Sergej has a postaxial polydactyly (There is something like wart on his left hand, and on his right there is something like pimple. On that basis the doctor thinks it's a  postaxial polydactyly). The association of ptosis and polydactyly with developmental delays clearly indicates a genetic disease / syndrome. This combination did not remind him of anomalies in any of the more common disformic syndrome, but searching through base of genetic diseases can be found a total of 20 entities which occur within the ptosis and polydactyly. To find the right diagnosis we have to do some analyses, but we can not do not even one of them in Serbia. In the meantime, we had to go to Slovenia to do surgery of ptosis. Why in Slovenia? Because even this can not be done right in Serbia. After first surgery we went one more time for another surgery, and we will go in three years again. So, this is not routine operation at all. Sergej is progressing nicely and it seems like that everything will be ok, but we can not be sure because we do not have a diagnosis, and it’s hard to think about expanding the family (what we want) because we do not know what is the risk that something like this happens again. I had to start asking geneticists around the world, because we already did everything that could done in Serbia, and now we are left to ourselves. Now I am in contact with some doctor from London. The doctor is interested in our case (because it is really specific and hard to figure out the diagnosis) and suggests some analysis and examinations. For this we need to go to London. For first examination in London we need 350£, for each additional 250£, for CGH analysis 550£, for metabolic analysis 2000£, for fragile X analysis 300£, for skeletal survey 932£, and of course we need to pay costs of travel and a week stay in London. That amount of money is huge for us, taking in account that we spent all of our money in therapies we had to do (it cost us a lot, because we had to do almost everything in private clinics). And even for this we had to ask some companies for help. Now I don’t know where to find money for those analyses. Some friend from America told me for this site. Now I want to try to collect money here.

What can I possibly offer to those who are able to help us? My promise that we will do everything for my son to be healthy and a good man. Sergej is a wonderful child, cheerful, smiling, sensitive, ... Every person who has a child knows how much it means when child is healthy. People in Serbia live very hard, with average salaries of 300€. Much more painful is when next to everyday problems that people have in Serbia, one have a sick child and not knowing what is with him.  Everything that we have done (my husband and I) was not simple, as anything in Serbia isn’t. We are trying to find the answer to the question what is with Sergej. This is important to know for eventually another child that we are planning, to be aware of the risk that something like this could happen again.

 Our story came out in the pages on the internet by a daily newspaper last year after first surgery in Slovnia. Here is the link (but all is on Serbian).

http://blog.blic.rs/611/Pisma-citalaca-Mali-Sergej-u-lavirintima-zdravstva-Srbije

I wrote by simply words because I speak English poorly

I ask all good people to help me. Then i can help my son and my family for good, healthy and heppy life.

Than you so much for your time.

All the best from little town Sombor
story_txt:
Hi, my name is Tiha Puaca. I am form Sombor, little town in Serbia. Excuse me for my bad English. I learnt English on my own. Like I said, my husband, son and I are from Serbia. This is small country in Europe. Serbia was in the 90's in a civil war, and in 1999. Serbia was bombed. We still suffer from this time, and we are living in poverty, the state is in chaos and therefore our health care, too.
My husband and I have become parents to our son Sergej in 2008. We were so happy. But after few months our problems have started.  We noticed that our Sergej late in psycho-motor development and he had a drooping eyelids.  It was not noticed by his pediatrician, what is big mistake in her work. Then we started wandering around from one doctor to another (physiatrists, neurologists, pediatricians, geneticists, oncologists, etc.). Over the next three years we went to physical therapy, MRI, scanner, various analyzes, etc. We stayed in hospital a lot, trying to find out what is with my son. Unfortunately all the doctors who saw Sergej did not know what to tell us. They did not know will Sergej ever walk and no one did know what to say about his eyelids. They just said that it is commonly to do a routine operation ptosis after the third year. Now I know it is not routine operation at all. So, after all this physical therapy (when Sergej was 2,5 years old) Sergej started to walk alone. This happiness I will never forget. But, we still don’t know what is wrong with him? MRI, scanner, all analyses …. everything is ok. So, what is wrong with our son? Then we have found another doctor (neurologist) and went to see him. This is the first doctor who said “we need to find out the real reason of his problems”. Finally some doctor said it. He sent us to see genetics doctor. Then we went to genetic doctor. He thinks Sergej has a postaxial polydactyly (There is something like wart on his left hand, and on his right there is something like pimple. On that basis the doctor thinks it's a  postaxial polydactyly). The association of ptosis and polydactyly with developmental delays clearly indicates a genetic disease / syndrome. This combination did not remind him of anomalies in any of the more common disformic syndrome, but searching through base of genetic diseases can be found a total of 20 entities which occur within the ptosis and polydactyly. To find the right diagnosis we have to do some analyses, but we can not do not even one of them in Serbia. In the meantime, we had to go to Slovenia to do surgery of ptosis. Why in Slovenia? Because even this can not be done right in Serbia. After first surgery we went one more time for another surgery, and we will go in three years again. So, this is not routine operation at all. Sergej is progressing nicely and it seems like that everything will be ok, but we can not be sure because we do not have a diagnosis, and it’s hard to think about expanding the family (what we want) because we do not know what is the risk that something like this happens again. I had to start asking geneticists around the world, because we already did everything that could done in Serbia, and now we are left to ourselves. Now I am in contact with some doctor from London. The doctor is interested in our case (because it is really specific and hard to figure out the diagnosis) and suggests some analysis and examinations. For this we need to go to London. For first examination in London we need 350£, for each additional 250£, for CGH analysis 550£, for metabolic analysis 2000£, for fragile X analysis 300£, for skeletal survey 932£, and of course we need to pay costs of travel and a week stay in London. That amount of money is huge for us, taking in account that we spent all of our money in therapies we had to do (it cost us a lot, because we had to do almost everything in private clinics). And even for this we had to ask some companies for help. Now I don’t know where to find money for those analyses. Some friend from America told me for this site. Now I want to try to collect money here.
What can I possibly offer to those who are able to help us? My promise that we will do everything for my son to be healthy and a good man. Sergej is a wonderful child, cheerful, smiling, sensitive, ... Every person who has a child knows how much it means when child is healthy. People in Serbia live very hard, with average salaries of 300€. Much more painful is when next to everyday problems that people have in Serbia, one have a sick child and not knowing what is with him.  Everything that we have done (my husband and I) was not simple, as anything in Serbia isn’t. We are trying to find the answer to the question what is with Sergej. This is important to know for eventually another child that we are planning, to be aware of the risk that something like this could happen again.
 Our story came out in the pages on the internet by a daily newspaper last year after first surgery in Slovnia. Here is the link (but all is on Serbian).
http://blog.blic.rs/611/Pisma-citalaca-Mali-Sergej-u-lavirintima-zdravstva-Srbije
I wrote by simply words because I speak English poorly
I ask all good people to help me. Then i can help my son and my family for good, healthy and heppy life.
Than you so much for your time.
All the best from little town Sombor

story:
***STRETCH GOALS***

Our campaign has surpassed all expectations, THANK YOU.  But let us raise an audacious suggestion. What if, instead of $25,000, we raised $250,000?

We would have funding sufficient to enroll FIVE HUNDRED patients.

Therefore, we're introducing a new campaign stretch goal of $250,000.  With your help, we believe we can get there.

 

WHAT IS ALL4CURE?

All4Cure brings together cancer patients, clinicians, and researchers in a common online platform.

Cancer patients share their medical information and All4Cure creates a detailed, de-identified dashboard that depicts their disease, treatments, and responses.

This means that patients can crowdsource treatment information from other patients, physicians and researchers, while at the same time allowing others to learn from their own experience.

In short: we're crowdsourcing a cure for cancer.

Our initial focus is on a form of blood cancer called myeloma.

 

WHY DOES THE WORLD NEED ALL4CURE?

Imagine if we could empower cancer patients by providing them with instant access to a network of hundreds of cancer experts?

Currently, in order to make treatment decisions, all patients can do is turn to a handful of experts in their network or try to find and understand complex medical information online.

Science moves too fast for anyone, even the best doctors, to keep up with everything that may be important for a specific patient's situation. That means patients are making life and death decisions without all of the available information.

Cancer patients will do better if they take control over their disease.

That’s what All4Cure is all about. 

 

HOW ALL4CURE WORKS

Patients, clinicians and researchers register (for free). Patients are assigned unique codes, researchers and clinicians are identified by name. 

Patients then download a HIPAA release form that they print, sign, date and provide to their doctor’s office, requesting that their records to be sent to All4Cure.

All4Cure extracts information from the medical record to create each patient’s Personalized Dashboard. 

Tony's dashboard at all4cure.com

Patient dashboards feature a Graph that captures the patient’s cancer history, from the time of diagnosis to the present. This information is updated on an ongoing basis. 

A Documents Panel allows for the presentation of much more detailed information, including physician progress notes (from which patient names are redacted), pathology or radiology reports, and molecular test results.

A Discussion Panel creates a forum for focused discussions by participating clinicians, researchers, other patients and their families. 

 

WHY YOU ARE CRITICAL TO OUR SUCCESS!

Our model for solving cancer requires the help of people from many different backgrounds - cancer patients, their friends and family members, scientists, health care professionals, and people who are just excited about our mission and want to help.

While the All4Cure platform is up and running with 250+ members, we’re only at the beginning of our journey.

We have patients on waiting lists, ready to take part. But, without more resources, our team cannot meet this demand.

To grow the community, we’ll need to hire IT folks, expand our support team, bring clinical scientists on board, and invest in better technology. 

This is why we need your help.

This is how we’ll bring the best possible experience to patients. This is how we’ll save lives.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT?

In January 2015, our founder Tony began to have hip pain.  This X ray, taken on April 9, 2015, told Tony that he had cancer.  

X ray of Tony's Hip April 9, 2015. Compare sides and you can see a large, black, egg shaped hole in on the right side of the pelvis (Tony's left), near the edge.

At the time that he was diagnosed, Tony was leading a novel clinical trial for patients with advanced breast cancer and had been a Professor of Hematology for 27 years. 

All4Cure is the unique position of understanding cancer from both the medical standpoint and from the patient's standpoint.

A year before he was diagnosed, Tony gave an inspirational TEDx talk describing a new type of clinical trial involves patients with an aggressive form of cancer (metastatic triple negative breast cancer [TNBC]). Take a look: 

 Our work has taught us that many scientists and clinicians from around the world are willing to lend their expertise in an attempt to help a patient who is fighting for his or her life.   

This insight formed the foundation for All4Cure.

By aggregating knowledge, we can truly empower patients to make the best possible decisions.

 

WE'VE BEEN FEATURED BY

 

 

OUR TEAM

FAQ

Why is All4Cure a for-profit company?

All4Cure's vision is enormous. We need large amounts of capital that we simply can't generate in a nonprofit environment.

Our founder, Tony, was part of a similar effort at the University of Washington with a platform set up as a nonprofit. Ultimately, that platform failed due to being unable to attract the necessary funding and was a main factor in Tony's decision to make All4Cure a for-profit organization.  100% of the funds we raise will go toward enrolling more patients.  Tony hasn't taken a salary since founding All4Cure in Sept 2016 and will continue to not take a salary until All4Cure is successful.

I’m a patient, why should I become an All4Cure member?

Your participation can help you and your oncologist. Cancer treatment is evolving so rapidly that it is difficult for anyone to know everything that may be relevant to a particular patient’s situation. All4Cure is the definitive resource for cancer patients to access the very latest information that is relevant to them. Your participation can help others. Other cancer patients can learn from your experiences. By learning from each other everyone benefits.

I’m a clinician, why should I become an All4Cure member?

Clinicians have extremely limited time to explore and assess all of the treatment options that may be available for their patients, a challenge made even greater by the information explosion in oncology. All4Cure helps clinicians by providing information about treatments, clinical trials, and tests that they may not have known about otherwise. Clinicians also have much to contribute. No one understands better the problems that confront cancer patients, and the gaps that frequently separate theory from practice. All4Cure provides a platform for scaling these insights.

I’m a researcher, why should I become an All4Cure member?

Cancer researchers are often several steps removed from cancer patients; All4Cure’s Knowledge Sharing Platform closes this gap. Researchers have knowledge that can be helpful to patients and oncologists in weighing various treatment options. Researchers can also identify and reach out to patients who may be candidates for their clinical trials. Insights gained from participating in All4Cure’s Knowledge Sharing Platform can help researchers design trials that address the aspirations and concerns of cancer patients.

Why focus initially on myeloma?

The outlook for myeloma patients has changed dramatically over the past 15 years with the development of an array of remarkably effective treatments. Four new drugs were FDA-approved in 2015 alone, and a large number of clinical trials aim to identify how these and other new drugs should be used. The days of regarding myeloma as an incurable disease are numbered, and All4Cure can help patients navigate this exciting and dynamic landscape.

Can patients with other types of cancer participate?

Yes. After establishing a foothold in myeloma we will expand to other cancers.  In the meantime we will gladly help patients with other types of cancer in whatever ways we can. Please contact us at info@all4cure.com.  We've also made a perk for patients with other forms of cancer who want their own All4Cure dashboard now.

Do All4Cure or its contributors provide medical advice?

No. Patients must rely on their oncologists for medical advice. Your oncologist will know you and your situation much better than we possibly can. All4Cure aims to fill the role of a knowledgeable friend, raising ideas that patients and their oncologists may want to consider in reaching treatment decisions.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Tony, the Founder and CEO of All4Cure, has myeloma himself. While he is in excellent health and is in a complete molecular remission, it is possible that his myeloma may return. While there are still very many treatment options at his disposal, this would definitely put a kink in the works.

story:
Chi Universe Presents 

Chi Phresh Mat & Yoga Game

A great way for your child to learn Yoga, be happy, healthy, and fit, love life, and bond with you! This easy-to-learn mat and game system properly aligns the body, and makes Yoga fun! Based on anatomical averages, the playful iconic symbols guide Yoga positions to simplify the complexities of physical movement. 

“Kourtney Kardashian and 5-year-old son love the Phresh Mat & Yoga Game!”

Used by Michelle Obama's Let's Move! LA events, the Four Seasons Resorts, and Yoga Journal Events. The Phresh Mats aren’t just an idea, they are researched, play-tested, and mother approved! The Chi Phresh Mat and Program is already making a real difference in our communities and schools! 

Image from Michelle Obama's Let's Move! LA event.

The Movement

Take the Yoga Challenge for Children's Health Awareness!!

Check out our Yoga Challenge happening on instagram @chiuniverseyoga!

The Chi Phresh Mat and program has been play-tested in P.E., afterschool programs, studios and homes. It has also travelled to public and private schools, YogaWorks, Girl Scouts, Equinox Gym, Star Afterschool, Venice Basketball League, and 8 countries! Chi Activating kids & families across the US and around the Globe!

THE IMPACT

This is the first generation in history with a lower life expectancy than their parents. We must act now for children's health! 

We've developed a prevention and reversal solution for childhood obesity! 

Overweight kids regain motivation, self-esteem, and a connection to healthy habits. The easy-to-follow visual cues are also beneficial for teaching children with developmental delay. Kids with disabilities gain more function in limbs. The mat and  program has been offered as Movement Therapy for kids within the Autism Spectrum. Autistic students find the symbols “concrete” objects to focus on. 

Image from Girls Scouts Yoga Class


The Yoga Game

The Chi Phresh Mat comes to life when used in conjunction with the Chi Flow & Phreeze Yoga Game. The Yoga Game can be found on the  "How-to" Poster (included with every mat), the Chi Flow & Phreeze App, Videos, and/or Card Deck. It's a comprehensive and easy to learn system!

The Chi Flow & Phreeze Yoga Game!  It's a combination of Flow Yoga & Breakdance Phreezes. Pictures, symbols, and instructions guide you through 10 Levels. Style your pose. Add a peace sign! 


Why a Pre-Sale for the Holidays?!

We started selling the Chi Phresh Mat & Yoga Game on the market with an overwhelmingly positive response.  Thank you!!!  ...  At the rate of recent sales we will sell out shortly before the holidays. 

The funds from the Pre-Sale will go into mass manufacturing to keep the momentum going...  We are launching this indiegogo campaign as a way to offer at a discount the Phresh Mat and Game, and newly offered Video and Card Game Deck... and yes it will make the perfect holiday gift! 

The positive response from kids and parents, encouragement from supporters and advisors, and the demand for the product and program has kept me going. Thank you! I'm excited and ready to bring the product to market in a bigger way. 

Mat Sizes Available

  1. Kids Mat fits approx ages 5-9 or (4'11 and below).
  2. Teen/Adult Mat fits approx ages 10 and above (4'11'-5'11").
                             Kids Mat                                       Teen/Tween/Adult Mat

*Pre-school Mats will be available in 2016. Sorry for the delay! Thanks for your interest and patience. We are still growing as a company. 

Check out our awesome Perks and Healthy Holiday Gift Sets!

Chi Phresh Mats come with a cool double sided "how-to" poster of poses. For the first time, we are offering the Instructional Video Download and Card Deck. With your order, we will send you the video link. Train with the Creator, Bobbi! 

Please Order early! We have a limited number of colors and sizes!

Buy today. We'll ship right away. Join our Phresh Phreeze Yoga Challenge on Instagram  @chiuniverseyoga !!!

*International friends, please email us if you wish to order: sales@chiuniverse.com


Teachers... Check out our Chi Universe Teacher Training Manual: 

The teacher's training manual makes it easy for schoolteachers, Yoga teachers, gym teachers, therapists, after-school leaders, and moms to implement the program. The Chi Phresh Mat is a teaching tool and also provides a fun way for teachers to incorporate their own curricula and sequences of poses. 


The Chi Flow & Phreeze Curriculum is presented in a fun game format that makes it easy to get kids of all abilities and ages physically active! The Training Manual outlines a 12 week curriculum with 10 Levels and  108 poses, introducing exercises - flow yoga, breakdance 'phreezes,' (urban dance moves,) core strengtheners, and martial arts—all combined with breathing techniques that calm the nervous system and enhance focused learning. 

We already have teachers successfully integrating the Chi Universe program in LA, NY, SF, Chicago, Scottsdale, Amsterdam, London, Johannesburg, Malta, and the Four Seasons Resorts in Asia. 

Why do kids find this program fun and engaging? 
The Chi Phresh Mat is a personal game board and playground that keeps the child involved and focused. Kids report feeling good even after 1 or 2 poses! 
The Chi Flow & Phreeze Game cleverly disguises physical education with a “cool” creative cultural element the “phresh phreeze” which requires styling a pose to make it flashy - like adding a peace sign. We've created a fun Phresh Phreeze campaign concept to get kids active and participating around the world! 

KVBL Venice Basketball League Summer Camp, Chi Universe Yoga Warm-Up!

Chi Phresh Mat appeals equally to boys and girls. Practicing Yoga is a great way to prevent sports injuries, increase sports performance, and focus the mind.


DOWNLOAD THE APP!

Chi Flow & Phreeze Yoga Game App available on iPad! Video Instruction available on the App by December. Make sure to update! :)

 https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/flow-phreeze-yoga-game/id888190893?mt=8

                       

How is the program health promoting? 

Chi Universe offers children a great cardiovascular workout while burning calories and improving flexibility, balance, coordination, strength, and stamina. By combining physical movements with breathing techniques, the program activates the parasympathetic nervous system lowering blood pressure, levels of stress hormone, and inflammation (which is implicated in diabetes, obesity, heart disease), inducing calm and focused learning. The twisting poses improve posture and help prevent scoliosis! The Chi Phresh Mat is a symmetrical design based on the principles of alignment, and aids these three functions; strong musculoskeletal foundation, proprioception, and cross neural development.

How does the program instill transferable skills, habits, and attitudes?

Kids feel happier and more confident!

Concentration on breath gives the child time to process information and emotion. Kids learn postures/moves as tools for life, to assist in regulating mood and tuning in. Self aware, deep thinking, and mindful, this generation will shift humanity!

How is the program sustainable and educational?

Chi Phresh Mats are environmentally friendly non-phthalate PVC. Recyclable. Washable Surface. Light weight. Our products are lab tested for children’s health and safety and exceed CA Toy Safety Standards.

Chi Phresh Mat is based on the Science of Yoga - a system of healing and preventative medicine. It's about health/fitness, no religious or spiritual references.

                       

What Does a Mat Purchase Contribute To?

Tools for a lifelong practice of Yoga, and physical, mental, and emotional health! 

Indiegogo funding will be used to manufacturing Chi Phresh Yoga Mats, Posters of Poses, and Card Deck. We've learned how to navigate manufacturing and supply chains, yet we are still in the early rounds of mass manufacturing which are quite costly for a start-up. Thank you for helping us afford a new round of inventory!

How You Can Support the Cause

The magnitude of your contribution is huge ... it keeps the wheels of the business turning by bringing in new inventory. This investment goes towards building a conscious generation! Please share the campaign and help us touch 10 million people to create awareness for Children's Physical, Mental, and Emotional Health!


About the Creator & the Phresh Yoga Mat Invention

I'm Bobbi Hamilton, a Certified Yoga Teacher, and lifelong devotee of Yoga. I believe in the healing effects of yoga for physical, mental, and emotional health. My love of movement began as a child athlete, and I’ve had extraordinary opportunities in working with Olympic diving coaches, and world-renowned Yoga, dance, and martial arts teachers. In college, I competed as a springboard and platform diver, and discovered that yoga alleviated my back pain and other accumulated sports injuries, as well as helped to calm my nervous system and focused my mind on schoolwork. I graduated from UC Berkeley, and while working in cancer research for UCSF/Mt. Zion, I became aware of the childhood obesity epidemic. Realizing the deep impact obesity and diabetes had on the future generation of kids, as well as the healthcare and economic systems, I turned my focus, attention and career towards creating prevention and reversal solutions for childhood obesity.


Chi Universe and Phresh Mat creator, Bobbi Hamilton. Photo by Stash Slionski

From lab research to field research, I began teaching Kids' Yoga and Fitness classes, and creating play-along videos to get kids active. My first videos, Animal Yoga Breaks, aired on PBS Kids stations in cities across the US which reached an estimated 20 million households in 2003-2008.

I accidentally invented the Chi Phresh Mat while teaching children’s yoga classes at the Venice Public Library. I began drawing on a mat to help a child get into the proper positions to prevent her from injuring herself. After thousands of hours of product development and play-testing, I believe whole heartedly in the positive effects of the Chi Phresh Mat! I've seen it transform families!

My inner Berkeley activist is more passionate and determined than ever to get Chi Phresh Yoga Mats to children, families, and schools to create a healthier and more peaceful society. If you believe in Yoga, support children’s health, and want to contribute peace and non-violence to our schools, homes, and Earth, please purchase Chi Phresh Mats here as a gift for your child, teen, self, school, or studio. Your purchases and contributions will help us meet the costs of manufacturing, and achieve a greater mission – offering a prevention and reversal solution for childhood obesity, and giving tools for lifelong wellness to kids and families. Thank you kindly for your support and for sharing this campaign with your yoga friends and teachers. Namaste!

Ways You Can Help

Purchase one of our awesome PERKS!!!

Connect with other Super Duper Phresh people and see more kid's phresh phreezes, join us on Facebook.  While you’re there, show us some love and let the world know that you like us! http://www.facebook.com/chiuniverse

For more information: www.ChiUniverse.com 

Follow us to stay updated! http://twitter.com/ChiUniverse

Check us out on instagram at @chiuniverseyoga ... We look forward to your phresh phreezes and posts! 

You can also help by spreading the word, and using the indiegogo share tools. Make some noise! Please let your child's school teachers know about us, and please please share with your Yoga community!  Get Chi Activated!!!

Chi Phresh Mat & Yoga GameA great way for your child to learn Yoga, be happy, healthy, and fit, love life, and bond with you! This easy-to-learn mat and game system properly aligns the body, and makes Yoga fun! Based on anatomical averages, the playful iconic symbols guide Yoga positions to simplify the complexities of physical movement. “Kourtney Kardashian and 5-year-old son love the Phresh Mat & Yoga Game!”Used by Michelle Obama's Let's Move! LA events, the Four Seasons Resorts, and Yoga Journal Events. The Phresh Mats aren’t just an idea, they are researched, play-tested, and mother approved! The Chi Phresh Mat and Program is already making a real difference in our communities and schools! 

Image from Michelle Obama's Let's Move! LA event.
The Movement
Take the Yoga Challenge for Children's Health Awareness!!
Check out our Yoga Challenge happening on instagram @chiuniverseyoga!
The Chi Phresh Mat and program has been play-tested in P.E., afterschool programs, studios and homes. It has also travelled to public and private schools, YogaWorks, Girl Scouts, Equinox Gym, Star Afterschool, Venice Basketball League, and 8 countries! Chi Activating kids & families across the US and around the Globe!

THE IMPACT
This is the first generation in history with a lower life expectancy than their parents. We must act now for children's health! 
We've developed a prevention and reversal solution for childhood obesity! 
Overweight kids regain motivation, self-esteem, and a connection to healthy habits. The easy-to-follow visual cues are also beneficial for teaching children with developmental delay. Kids with disabilities gain more function in limbs. The mat and  program has been offered as Movement Therapy for kids within the Autism Spectrum. Autistic students find the symbols “concrete” objects to focus on. 





Image from Girls Scouts Yoga Class


The Yoga Game
The Chi Phresh Mat comes to life when used in conjunction with the Chi Flow & Phreeze Yoga Game. The Yoga Game can be found on the  "How-to" Poster (included with every mat), the Chi Flow & Phreeze App, Videos, and/or Card Deck. It's a comprehensive and easy to learn system!


The Chi Flow & Phreeze Yoga Game!  It's a combination of Flow Yoga & Breakdance Phreezes. Pictures, symbols, and instructions guide you through 10 Levels. Style your pose. Add a peace sign! 







Why a Pre-Sale for the Holidays?!
We started selling the Chi Phresh Mat & Yoga Game on the market with an overwhelmingly positive response.  Thank you!!!  ...  At the rate of recent sales we will sell out shortly before the holidays. 
The funds from the Pre-Sale will go into mass manufacturing to keep the momentum going...  We are launching this indiegogo campaign as a way to offer at a discount the Phresh Mat and Game, and newly offered Video and Card Game Deck... and yes it will make the perfect holiday gift! 
The positive response from kids and parents, encouragement from supporters and advisors, and the demand for the product and program has kept me going. Thank you! I'm excited and ready to bring the product to market in a bigger way. 
Mat Sizes Available

Kids Mat fits approx ages 5-9 or (4'11 and below).
Teen/Adult Mat fits approx ages 10 and above (4'11'-5'11").

                             Kids Mat                                       Teen/Tween/Adult Mat



*Pre-school Mats will be available in 2016. Sorry for the delay! Thanks for your interest and patience. We are still growing as a company. 


Check out our awesome Perks and Healthy Holiday Gift Sets!
Chi Phresh Mats come with a cool double sided "how-to" poster of poses. For the first time, we are offering the Instructional Video Download and Card Deck. With your order, we will send you the video link. Train with the Creator, Bobbi! 
Please Order early! We have a limited number of colors and sizes!
Buy today. We'll ship right away. Join our Phresh Phreeze Yoga Challenge on Instagram  @chiuniverseyoga !!!
*International friends, please email us if you wish to order: sales@chiuniverse.com

Teachers... Check out our Chi Universe Teacher Training Manual: 
The teacher's training manual makes it easy for schoolteachers, Yoga teachers, gym teachers, therapists, after-school leaders, and moms to implement the program. The Chi Phresh Mat is a teaching tool and also provides a fun way for teachers to incorporate their own curricula and sequences of poses. 

The Chi Flow & Phreeze Curriculum is presented in a fun game format that makes it easy to get kids of all abilities and ages physically active! The Training Manual outlines a 12 week curriculum with 10 Levels and  108 poses, introducing exercises - flow yoga, breakdance 'phreezes,' (urban dance moves,) core strengtheners, and martial arts—all combined with breathing techniques that calm the nervous system and enhance focused learning. 
We already have teachers successfully integrating the Chi Universe program in LA, NY, SF, Chicago, Scottsdale, Amsterdam, London, Johannesburg, Malta, and the Four Seasons Resorts in Asia. 

Why do kids find this program fun and engaging? 
The Chi Phresh Mat is a personal game board and playground that keeps the child involved and focused. Kids report feeling good even after 1 or 2 poses! 
The Chi Flow & Phreeze Game cleverly disguises physical education with a “cool” creative cultural element the “phresh phreeze” which requires styling a pose to make it flashy - like adding a peace sign. We've created a fun Phresh Phreeze campaign concept to get kids active and participating around the world! 






KVBL Venice Basketball League Summer Camp, Chi Universe Yoga Warm-Up!
Chi Phresh Mat appeals equally to boys and girls. Practicing Yoga is a great way to prevent sports injuries, increase sports performance, and focus the mind.

DOWNLOAD THE APP!
Chi Flow & Phreeze Yoga Game App available on iPad! Video Instruction available on the App by December. Make sure to update! :)
 https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/flow-phreeze-yoga-game/id888190893?mt=8
                       


How is the program health promoting? 
Chi Universe offers children a great cardiovascular workout while burning calories and improving flexibility, balance, coordination, strength, and stamina. By combining physical movements with breathing techniques, the program activates the parasympathetic nervous system lowering blood pressure, levels of stress hormone, and inflammation (which is implicated in diabetes, obesity, heart disease), inducing calm and focused learning. The twisting poses improve posture and help prevent scoliosis! The Chi Phresh Mat is a symmetrical design based on the principles of alignment, and aids these three functions; strong musculoskeletal foundation, proprioception, and cross neural development.
How does the program instill transferable skills, habits, and attitudes?
Kids feel happier and more confident!
Concentration on breath gives the child time to process information and emotion. Kids learn postures/moves as tools for life, to assist in regulating mood and tuning in. Self aware, deep thinking, and mindful, this generation will shift humanity!


How is the program sustainable and educational?

Chi Phresh Mats are environmentally friendly non-phthalate PVC. Recyclable. Washable Surface. Light weight. Our products are lab tested for children’s health and safety and exceed CA Toy Safety Standards.
Chi Phresh Mat is based on the Science of Yoga - a system of healing and preventative medicine. It's about health/fitness, no religious or spiritual references.
                       
What Does a Mat Purchase Contribute To?
Tools for a lifelong practice of Yoga, and physical, mental, and emotional health! 
Indiegogo funding will be used to manufacturing Chi Phresh Yoga Mats, Posters of Poses, and Card Deck. We've learned how to navigate manufacturing and supply chains, yet we are still in the early rounds of mass manufacturing which are quite costly for a start-up. Thank you for helping us afford a new round of inventory!
How You Can Support the Cause
The magnitude of your contribution is huge ... it keeps the wheels of the business turning by bringing in new inventory. This investment goes towards building a conscious generation! Please share the campaign and help us touch 10 million people to create awareness for Children's Physical, Mental, and Emotional Health!
About the Creator & the Phresh Yoga Mat Invention
I'm Bobbi Hamilton, a Certified Yoga Teacher, and lifelong devotee of Yoga. I believe in the healing effects of yoga for physical, mental, and emotional health. My love of movement began as a child athlete, and I’ve had extraordinary opportunities in working with Olympic diving coaches, and world-renowned Yoga, dance, and martial arts teachers. In college, I competed as a springboard and platform diver, and discovered that yoga alleviated my back pain and other accumulated sports injuries, as well as helped to calm my nervous system and focused my mind on schoolwork. I graduated from UC Berkeley, and while working in cancer research for UCSF/Mt. Zion, I became aware of the childhood obesity epidemic. Realizing the deep impact obesity and diabetes had on the future generation of kids, as well as the healthcare and economic systems, I turned my focus, attention and career towards creating prevention and reversal solutions for childhood obesity.




Chi Universe and Phresh Mat creator, Bobbi Hamilton. Photo by Stash Slionski
From lab research to field research, I began teaching Kids' Yoga and Fitness classes, and creating play-along videos to get kids active. My first videos, Animal Yoga Breaks, aired on PBS Kids stations in cities across the US which reached an estimated 20 million households in 2003-2008.
I accidentally invented the Chi Phresh Mat while teaching children’s yoga classes at the Venice Public Library. I began drawing on a mat to help a child get into the proper positions to prevent her from injuring herself. After thousands of hours of product development and play-testing, I believe whole heartedly in the positive effects of the Chi Phresh Mat! I've seen it transform families!My inner Berkeley activist is more passionate and determined than ever to get Chi Phresh Yoga Mats to children, families, and schools to create a healthier and more peaceful society. If you believe in Yoga, support children’s health, and want to contribute peace and non-violence to our schools, homes, and Earth, please purchase Chi Phresh Mats here as a gift for your child, teen, self, school, or studio. Your purchases and contributions will help us meet the costs of manufacturing, and achieve a greater mission – offering a prevention and reversal solution for childhood obesity, and giving tools for lifelong wellness to kids and families. Thank you kindly for your support and for sharing this campaign with your yoga friends and teachers. Namaste!



Ways You Can Help
Purchase one of our awesome PERKS!!!

Connect with other Super Duper Phresh people and see more kid's phresh phreezes, join us on Facebook.  While you’re there, show us some love and let the world know that you like us! http://www.facebook.com/chiuniverse
For more information: www.ChiUniverse.com 
Follow us to stay updated! http://twitter.com/ChiUniverse
Check us out on instagram at @chiuniverseyoga ... We look forward to your phresh phreezes and posts! 
You can also help by spreading the word, and using the indiegogo share tools. Make some noise! Please let your child's school teachers know about us, and please please share with your Yoga community!  Get Chi Activated!!!

story:
About Roots of Wisdom

My name is Chirag Patel, and I have an extensive background in yoga, Prana, and Ayurveda. I also have a successful brick-and-mortar store in Altamonte Springs, Florida where I sell health and wellness products.

To me, yoga is a global community and conversation. I want to bring my experience to the table with supplements designed specifically with yoga, Prana, and Ayurvedic healing in mind. My products are a healthy and yogic approach to exercise and wellness.

What We Need - Our Goals

What You Get - Our Rewards

Our Impact - Feed the Soul, Feed Needy Children

As a successful business owner with experience both in retail, manufacturing and distribution, and yoga, I have a lot to offer. We have already secured our first batches and have scalable supply and distribution already ironed out. We are ready to ship now and are prepared to quickly satisfy even very high volume.

The real impact on the world that I envision here is simply making peoples' lives better. I want to bring a new product to market that helps people achieve a lasting mind and body happiness without unnatural additives and harmful chemicals.

Lastly, every bottled product sold will fund a child's meal kit through the nonprofit Feeding Children Everywhere. My family and I will be personally assembling these kits, and some of our rewards even include personalized video of us assembling our kits funded by our pledgers.

Risks & Challenges

We have worked very hard to anticipate risks and challenges. We are not in a research or prototyping phase - we have products ready to ship out now.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute just yet? We are thankful for all of our help. We need help sharing this crowdfund on social media!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Miriam Gaudelli, I have been a massage therapist since 2005.  Back in 2015, I suffered from a concussion and I just wasn't getting better with the standardized concussion treatments.  I understood how frustrating it can be when you want to get better, but you seem to be stuck in a rut.  It was through the help of specialized individuals that I got better.

I am raising funds so that rehabilitation can be easier and more effective for my clients.  When someone has a concussion, they suffer from memory loss, fatigue, mood swings and changes in energy levels, it isn't the time for them to be going from clinic to clinic so they can get the rehabilitation they need.  With this campaign, I would like to bring various technologies in house so they only need to take appointments at ONE clinic and have ONE file that can be easily discussed with parents, doctors and coaching staff.  

What We Need & What You Get

With this campaign, I would like to make concussion rehabilitation more accessible and easier to follow. I would like to raise 20 000$ Canadian (17000$ USD) so that I can:

- purchase the saccadic eye testing technology

- exercise equipement for concussions

- bike ergometer for exercise testing and rehabilitation

- more comfortable and adjustable treatment tables

- translation of the concussion information currently available in english

The Impact

Because of my experience as someone who suffered concussions and someone who has helped many rehabilitate their concussions, I have seen what an impact a concussion can have.  I've met people who dropped out of school, had to stop working, couldn't concentrate and some who suffer from permanent depression.  My personal anxiety stems from the concussions I suffered.  Luckily through the rehabilitation that I did and my art work, I am able to keep my anxiety at bay most of the time.  I would like to help others in similar situations.

Many methods of evaluating or tracking concussion rehabilitation are subjective and can easily be swayed, the technology I will be bringing in will give me concrete reports on the areas that need more work so we can be more effective.  

I've run a series of case studies with the work I have already done and hope to one day publish these case studies.  I hope to one day also contribute to concussion rehabilitation research through work that I do in my clinic.  This is a subject that I am very passionate about and hope to make a difference in people's lives. 

I've been reading many books on the lives of ex-professional sports players and all I can ask myself, is "how can I help my clients so they never go through this?"

Risks & Challenges

The equipment I need is quite costly and my biggest fear is that I won't be able to pay for it all at once.  I have spoken to the company and they are able to make payment plans but would prefer not to.  Having the machine fully paid and functional from day one is the best scenario.

Many years ago, I had a business that failed, and it taught me a lot.  I have learned about innovative marketing tactics, financial survival and interesting business development strategies.  I wrote a manual on some of the things I learned that can be purchased through the crowd funding.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, or don't feel passionate about this subject, I get it!  Please help me by sharing it with your friends, family and anyone you know who might be interested.  Any help you can give me is greatly appreciated.

story:
Alle Informationen auf Deutsch, weiter unten auf dieser Seite!

About us

I´m Alex, and I wish to give something back to my best friend (34): Her smile. She always was with me in my hardest times, I wouldn´t be there where I am without her, she brought me back to life. But it´s not about me here, I´m fine today, now
it´s time to say thanks to her. 

What it is about

It´s not simply about her smile, it is a lot more than that. Language and speech is her big vocation, she is working as a speaker. Because of her health problems, for example with her adrenal glands, she isn´t able to do every job and due to problems with her actual dentition situation, she is more than restricted. Since she was a child, 6 years old, she had health problems, with ignitions and damaged teeth. Until today there was only temporary relief. I want to get the financial resources for artificial teeth, these are not payed by national health services. So that the pain and restrictions, she has with her every-day life, come to an end.

Situation today

Her gingival is ignited, and as the lower back teeth and one eyetooth are missing, she is chewing on the gingival and it went so far, that, caused by that, there is also a scarved hole from the inside of her left cheek to the outside. This kind of pain I want to spare her in future. It´s getting worse, she barely has the energy at the moment for her normal living. If we wait much longer, she will need a full denture for the lower jaw.

The effect to her job
As a voice over artist she needs the implants as well, to get rid off her adventitious sounds on the recordings. With the missing teeth she makes side sounds while speaking and the same with common prosthesis.
I want to prevent that with dental bridges or proper implants. I am worried that we cannot break the circle she´s getting in. Due to her whole health situation her monthly income is almost over the bread line, that´s too low to face anything.

The solution is the goal

Should we wait with help until it´s too late? Let´s help right now!

- The ignition must be healed by a dentist
- She needs professional dental bridges (or implants), these are not payed by national health services

After surgery she has to do training again to get used to the new situation, to speak professionally. That depends on her.

If this campaign is successful, this action will be a surprise for her, she doesn't know about this. I want to give her back a better life. That´s what friends are for.

That professional speech recordings are possible so that she stays on her feet, for what she is supposed to do for living. To give her a free head to start over again.

But our milieu is not able to raise any funds here.

Perhaps it´s possible to help her on this way. But that I can help, I need your help!

Stay tuned and get in touch

If you have any questions about this campain, feel free to ask me via E-mail or leave a comment. For news: I send you any updates via E-mail or follow me on Indigogo. And please spread the word wherever you want, to give C. Ruth a chance to go forward.

You would do a big favor to two people, any donation is bringing us closer to  our dream. Thank you!

I want that she is able again to laugh heartly and chew properly.



In German:

Über uns

Ich bin Alex. Ich möchte ein Lachen schenken und meiner besten Freundin (34) damit etwas zurückgeben. Sie stand mir in meiner schwersten Zeit immer beiseite und führte mich sozusagen ins Leben zurück. Ohne sie wäre ich nicht da, wo ich heute bin. Ich bin über den Berg, jetzt ist es an der Zeit für mich, Danke zu sagen.

Worum es geht

Es geht nicht einfach nur um ihr Lächeln, es ist viel mehr als das. Sprache ist ihre Berufung, sie arbeitet als Sprecherin. Durch ihre gesundheitliche Situation, kann sie nicht jeder Arbeit nachgehen und durch die Probleme mit dem Gebiss ist sie in ihrer möglichen Arbeit mehr als eingeschränkt. Mit 6 Jahren fingen die gesundheitlichen Probleme an, zum Beispiel mit den Nebennieren, Entzündungen und zerstörten Zähnen. Bisher gab es immer nur kurzweilige Linderung. Ich möchte die finanziellen Mittel zusammenbringen, um ihr einen adäquaten Zahnersatz zu ermöglichen, den sie braucht, damit ihre Schmerzen und Beeinträchtigungen endlich ein Ende haben. Dieser wird leider nicht von den Krankenkassen übernommen.

Die Situation heute

Ihr Zahnfleisch entzündet sich immer wieder, sie muss auf dem Zahnfleisch kauen weil ihr die unteren Backenzähne und ein Eckzahn fehlen. Das führte bereits soweit, dass sich ein vernarbtes Loch von der Innenseite der linken Backe nach außen hin gebildet hat. Solche Schmerzen möchte ich ihr für die Zukunft ersparen. Es wird immer schlimmer, es ist ihr mittlerweile kaum noch möglich, die Energie aufzubringen, die sie für ihren Alltag braucht. Wenn noch länger gewartet wird, braucht sie eine Vollprothese für den Unterkiefer.

Auswirkungen auf den Job

Als Sprecherin braucht sie die Implantate auch, da ohne sie Nebengeräusche entstehen, die auf Aufnahmen zu hören sind. Auch herkömmliche Prothesen machen es nicht besser und erzeugen ebenfalls Störgeräusche. Die Lösung ist ordentlicher Zahnersatz - Brücken oder Implantate. Auch damit sie endlich aus dem Teufelskreis herauskommt. Durch die gesundheitlichen Probleme lebt sie knapp über dem Existenzminimum. Das ist zu wenig um selbst etwas ändern zu können.

Die Lösung ist das Ziel

Warum warten, bis es zu spät ist? Lasst uns jetzt helfen!

- Die Entzündungen müssen von einem Zahnarzt behandelt werden.

- Sie braucht professionelle Brücken (oder Implantate), diese werden nicht von der Krankenkasse übernommen.

Nach der Operation wird sie das professionelle Sprechen erneut trainieren müssen, das liegt dann bei ihr.

Ich will sie mit dieser Idee überraschen, falls die Spendenaktion erfolgreich wird und ihr damit helfen, ein Leben zu führen, das wieder lebenswerter ist. Dafür sind Freunde da. Um für einen freien Kopf zu sorgen. Ich möchte, dass ihr wieder professionelle Aufnahmen möglich sind, damit ihr Auskommen gesichert ist und sie grundsätzlich auf den Beinen bleibt.

Unser familiäres und freundschaftliches Umfeld ist nicht in der Lage, ihr finanziell zu helfen. Vielleicht schaffe ich es auf diesem Weg, mich bei ihr angemessen zu bedanken. 

Damit ich helfen kann, brauche ich Eure Hilfe.

In Verbindung bleiben

Falls ihr irgendwelche Fragen zu dieser Kampagne habt, fragt per E-Mail oder hinterlasst einen Kommentar. Neuigkeiten schicke ich Euch auch gerne per Mail oder folgt mir einfach hier auf Indigogo. Und bitte verbreitet diese Kampagne, wo auch immer Ihr könnt, damit C. Ruth wieder nach vorne blicken kann!

Ihr würdet zwei Menschen einen großen Wunsch erfüllen, egal, mit welchem Betrag! Danke!

Ich wünsche mir, dass sie wieder herzlich lachen und normal kauen kann!

Es geht nicht einfach nur um ihr Lächeln, es ist
viel mehr als das. Sprache ist ihre Berufung, sie arbeitet als Sprecherin.
Durch ihre gesundheitliche Situation, kann sie nicht jeder Arbeit nachgehen und durch die Probleme mit dem Gebiss ist sie in ihrer möglichen Arbeit mehr als eingeschränkt. Mit 6 Jahren fingen
die gesundheitlichen Probleme an, zum Beispiel mit den Nebennieren,
Entzündungen und zerstörten Zähnen. Bisher gab es immer nur kurzweilige
Linderung. Ich möchte die finanziellen Mittel zusammenbringen, um ihr einen adäquaten
Zahnersatz zu ermöglichen, den sie braucht, damit ihre Schmerzen und
Beeinträchtigungen endlich ein Ende haben. Dieser wird leider nicht von den
Krankenkassen übernommen.
Die Situation heute
Ihr Zahnfleisch entzündet sich immer wieder, sie muss
auf dem Zahnfleisch kauen weil ihr die unteren Backenzähne und ein Eckzahn fehlen. Das
führte bereits soweit, dass sich ein vernarbtes Loch von der Innenseite der
linken Backe nach außen hin gebildet hat. Solche Schmerzen möchte ich ihr für die
Zukunft ersparen. Es wird immer schlimmer, es ist ihr mittlerweile kaum noch möglich,
die Energie aufzubringen, die sie für ihren Alltag braucht. Wenn noch länger
gewartet wird, braucht sie eine Vollprothese für den Unterkiefer.
Auswirkungen auf den Job
Als Sprecherin braucht sie die Implantate auch, da ohne
sie Nebengeräusche entstehen, die auf Aufnahmen zu hören sind. Auch herkömmliche
Prothesen machen es nicht besser und erzeugen ebenfalls Störgeräusche. Die Lösung ist ordentlicher Zahnersatz - Brücken oder Implantate. Auch damit
sie endlich aus dem Teufelskreis herauskommt. Durch die gesundheitlichen Probleme lebt sie knapp
über dem Existenzminimum. Das ist zu wenig um selbst etwas ändern zu können.
Die Lösung ist das Ziel
Warum warten, bis es zu spät ist? Lasst uns jetzt
helfen!
- Die Entzündungen müssen von einem Zahnarzt behandelt werden.
- Sie braucht professionelle Brücken (oder Implantate), diese werden nicht von der Krankenkasse übernommen.
Nach der Operation wird sie das professionelle
Sprechen erneut trainieren müssen, das liegt dann bei ihr.
Ich will sie mit dieser Idee überraschen, falls die
Spendenaktion erfolgreich wird und ihr damit helfen, ein Leben zu führen, das
wieder lebenswerter ist. Dafür sind Freunde da. Um für einen freien Kopf zu
sorgen. Ich möchte, dass ihr wieder professionelle Aufnahmen möglich sind,
damit ihr Auskommen gesichert ist und sie grundsätzlich auf den Beinen bleibt.
Unser familiäres und freundschaftliches Umfeld ist
nicht in der Lage, ihr finanziell zu helfen. Vielleicht schaffe ich es auf
diesem Weg, mich bei ihr angemessen zu bedanken. 
Damit ich helfen kann, brauche ich Eure Hilfe.In Verbindung bleiben
Falls ihr irgendwelche Fragen zu dieser Kampagne
habt, fragt per E-Mail oder hinterlasst einen Kommentar. Neuigkeiten schicke
ich Euch auch gerne per Mail oder folgt mir einfach hier auf Indigogo. Und
bitte verbreitet diese Kampagne, wo auch immer Ihr könnt, damit C. Ruth wieder nach
vorne blicken kann!
Ihr würdet zwei Menschen einen großen Wunsch erfüllen,
egal, mit welchem Betrag! Danke!
Ich
wünsche mir, dass sie wieder herzlich lachen und normal kauen kann!

story:
Hi! I'm Emily. I'm a doula, childbirth educator, and student midwife in Colorado. 

Over the past 5 years, I've been working with expectant families and newborns as an educator and birth and postpartum doula. I have been able to take midwifery courses off and on, but am ready to fully plunge into my continuing education through The Birth Institute starting next July. 

This three year accreditation program will help me become a certified midwife in the state of Colorado. My ultimate goal, however, is to help the incredible international group of midwives, doctors, politicians, advocates, and parents form better policy for maternal and infant care around the world--including improving the standards for care here in the U.S. 

Why Do I Want to be a Midwife?
I have worked with women and children in many different capacities over the past decade and have seen that the biggest impact I can make is during that critical childbearing year--both for mother and baby. Whether it's been in a refugee settlement, or talking to women who have been displaced for environmental reasons, or in the various communities I've worked in here in the U.S., having quality care that honors their individual needs has made a huge difference in the rest of their lives. My job is never boring and it rarely leaves me unsatisfied. I want to expand upon the knowledge I already have as a doula to be able to act as a woman's primary caregiver in pregnancy as well as holistic well woman care. I'm excited to see how this particular clinic is able to give inclusive, holistic, and evidence-based care in a setting far different from the homes and hospitals where most American women give birth. 

One of the reasons I am choosing to continue my education through The Birth Institute is for the opportunity to practice my clinical requirements abroad as well as to take online courses with other aspiring midwives around the world. I believe we learn best when we reach out further and learning from these women with varying backgrounds and experiences will only serve to make me a better midwife and advocate. 

I am only asking for a contribution to go toward the actual tuition ($5420 for the first 2 semester's placement--abroad and at home) and not for costs of the trip (like airfare and ground transportation costs). The breakdown is that it will cost me about $76 a day for the 10 week training plus the placement fees. I already have a lot saved up for the entire 6 month abroad portion, but this $2,000 will go a long way in helping me secure my placement by the Nov. 25th deadline. It is also important to note that almost $4,000 of the initial fee goes directly to the midwifery clinic to help keep their doors open, buy supplies, and pay for the local and international instructors' and practicing midwives' salaries.  My tutition will go then mostly to my trainers in Bali who are graciously helping to train other midwives from all over the world and improving care in their communities. 

As our maternal and infant care outcomes drop while the rest of the industrialized world saw gains, women more and more are looking to midwives for their care in pregnancy and beyond. The UN and WHO, as well as hundreds of NGOs around the world are calling for midwives to provide well woman care, quality care in pregnancy, and helping children around the world thrive past infancy. I hope to serve my fast growing community while gaining outside experience through a study abroad program and to finish my certification in 3 years or less. Being able to enroll in full time midwifery education in July 2015 and travel to Bali in September will get me that much closer to my goal and put at least one more midwife out in the world. 
Thank you so much for taking the time to read and support me!

story:
Wie ihr alle schon wisst, feiert Nico bald seinen 30. Geburtstag!

Allerdings, nach 30 Jahren auf dieser Erde, schlurft er immer noch durch die Gegend und träumt von einem arschgeilen Rad.

Lasst uns seinen Traum verwirklichen!
story_txt: Wie ihr alle schon wisst, feiert Nico bald seinen 30. Geburtstag!Allerdings, nach 30 Jahren auf dieser Erde, schlurft er immer noch durch die Gegend und träumt von einem arschgeilen Rad.Lasst uns seinen Traum verwirklichen!

story:
Did you know nearly half of newborns develop a flat spot on their head within two months? Turn Your Baby can help prevent this. Please help us put this problem to sleep by supporting our crowdfunding campaign.

The American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) recommends parents rotate their newborn's head each time the baby sleeps to avoid flat head syndrome. But this instruction is often overshadowed by the more well-known "Back to Sleep" campaign (which makes flat spots more likely). More importantly, for parents to properly implement this instruction, they must also remember in what head position the baby slept last time. That's where Turn Your Baby comes in!

With three light-up buttons, one for each sleeping head position (back-left, back-center, back-right), parents and caregivers can easily track which position the baby slept in last time in order to choose a different head position the next time. Because let's face it, parents with newborns are always tired, and tired people easily forget. So let the Turn Your Baby do the remembering for you!

Turn Your Baby was started by Irene Collado when her son Lucas was treated for flat spots in 2013. She was very upset by the thought of using a helmet to correct Lucas's flat spots. So when she later learned that flat spots can be avoided by regularly turning a newborn's head each time the baby sleeps, the proverbial light bulb lit up in her head! - remind parents to "Turn Your Baby!" 

Irene immediately started thinking "how can I put a reminder to 'turn your baby' right where it counts most - on or next to the crib/carrier/stroller so you can't miss it! So Turn Your Baby comes with multiple attachment mechanisms - a screw clamp that can attach to crib railings, Velcro straps running in either direction to attach to carrier/stroller handles, and a kickstand to prop it up on a changing table, dresser or nightstand.

Dr. Chad Perlyn, the pediatric plastic surgeon who treated Lucas, and a Fellow of the AAP, joined Turn Your Baby as Medical Director when he saw the solution Irene came up with. He has long believed that more focus should be placed on prevention instead of treatment, and that’s why he's excited about Turn Your Baby.

In addition to the reminder device, Turn Your Baby aims to launch a national advocacy campaign to raise awareness of this simple but often overlooked prevention technique. So the more money we raise, the bigger and more effective the campaign will be.  Please consider sponsoring the campaign at one of our higher contribution levels, or you can contribute without choosing a perk if you just want to support the campaign. 

We are seeking to raise at least $20,000 through pre-sales of our reminder device (and other branded merchandise) to prove demand for the product and launch the Turn Your Baby brand. You can also choose a perk but have us donate it on your behalf (we will verify your choice by email after the campaign).

We have completed preliminary mechanical and electrical design work for the device, so our next steps are to tweak the designs to streamline assembly and identify suppliers. 

The device is designed to run on three AAA batteries, which should last a few months thanks to an electrical design focused on low power consumption. Also keep in mind that the risk of developing flat spots typically occurs during a newborn's first 6 to 8 months. So we anticipate the most you might need to change the batteries is once or twice. There is also an On/Off switch and memory which will cause the device to default to the last selected position after it has been turned off and then on again. This will help you extend battery life. We also plan to offer only one color (blue) initially, but we will try our best to offer a second color (pink) after we receive final price quotes from our supplier.

The Turn Your Baby device is patent pending (App. No. 14/500,157)

story:
Dear friends and family of Vara,

Vara's brother David passed away unexpectedly on July 29th. He was 58 and in Vara's words, "a beautiful and sensitive being."

Vara will plan a  gathering in September to celebrate David's life, and details will be forwarded as soon as they are available.

For now, Vara has the emotional and financial responsibilities of caring for David's legacy, paying funeral expenses (already over $3,000), moving and storing his belongings, and attending to the unfortunate details that are required at the end of a life, all while dealing with deep grief.

We hope that along with offering your heartfelt thoughts, you might be able to contribute financially, to relieve some of the significant monetary burden that Vara will need to bear.

Thanks in advance,

BB-FOV (Boston-based Friends of Vara)
story_txt:

story:
Summary

Strawberry Moon is Seattle's definitive source for raw, cold-pressed juice. We strive to find a balance between the utilitarian need for nutrition, and the epicurean desire for flavor and nuance. In order to make a daily juice habit as palatable as possible, we craft over 20 different flavors, or "remedies" of green juices, root vegetable juices, citrus juices, and nut mylks. If you are familiar with our brand already, you know that it is an incredibly eclectic array of potions and panaceas. 
Here is what other people said:
http://www.yelp.com/biz/strawberry-moon-juice-seattle
Our juice:
- is non-gmo
- uses locally sourced produce whenever possible
- uses organic produce whenever possible
- is never high pressure processed (HPP is a non-thermal pasteurization process that lengthens shelf life, but damages the integrity of the enzymes, nutrients, minerals, and probiotics that would otherwise be present in truly raw juice. Because we do not HPP our juice, it is truly fresh, which means it expires within four days.)
http://www.foodnavigator-usa.com/Regulation/Suja-Life-raw-juices-in-lawsuit-on-high-pressure-processing-HPP

What We Need

We have been cold-pressing juice for nearly five years. A few months ago, in hopes of conjuring up our very own retail space, we were led to a location in Queen Anne that we were told was already permitted as a “cafe". Eagerly, we dove right in. What we’ve found out since contradicts that information, and now, after sinking a great deal of time and resources into the space, we have discovered that we ourselves are responsible to fully permit the location. Furthermore, if the original space (before we moved in) was never built to code, the cost of repairs may prove unfeasible. We are struggling to secure the final, long term permits that would allow us to sell our juice from our Queen Anne location. We already have a handful of permits hanging on the wall, but as of now, it seems we need some more. 

So, with $15,000:

- we will obtain a full plumbing inspection and permitting of the space.

-if full permitting is feasible, we will complete all finishing touches in the store that are needed (rearrange sinks, insert grease trap, inspect and finalize plumbing and electricity) 

- we will complete the permitting process in full

- if the plumbing and electrical permits prove too costly, we would seek to establish a foundation at various Farmers Markets, while securing a refrigerated juice truck to improve delivery and create a mobile juice program.

- any funds we raise in addition to our goal will go towards solving corporate greed, ISIS, and climate change.

Primarily however, this money will be used to determine the best means for us to make and sell fresh, healthy, raw juices and foods in the Emerald City, and beyond. While you can purchase non-fresh, HPP juice at almost any store in Seattle, finding truly raw juice in this town is not an easy thing to do. The red tape one must go through in order to press and sell fresh juice is a mine field of uncertainty. We are working closely with the city, and now the state, for the right to deliver health giving, delicious raw juice in the safest way allowed. So, if the space is eventually deemed unusable, we would redirect the funds towards avenues that would allow us to continue pressing fresh juice for the community, and the means for getting that juice to those who want it.

 This is a fixed funding campaign. An all or nothing effort. We want to do this right, and the only way to do that is by reaching our goal in full. If we are unable to do that, the funds will not be collected, and we will all die consuming corporate food.

 What You Get

Support our campaign and receive stupendous deals on raw juice, as well as a means to secure your food rights. You have the right to nutritionally dense foods. You have the right to truly fresh juice. These rights, while undeniable, still must be fought for. Aside from perks and rewards, you are getting two hippies standing up for food freedom. It's a hippie food fight :) We truly believe a consistent juice habit can work wonders in people's lives, so start your habit today, or gift it to a friend! 
*** Regarding perks that are "in store pick up only" - as previously stated, the future of our store is in flux. If the retail space does not receive the permits needed, but the company still remains viable, all perks will be honored, but will have to be adjusted to include pick up at another location, or arranged delivery.***

The Impact

At the moment, Queen Anne lacks an environment for the health conscious consumer. We want to foster a commUnity and a conversation about the benefits of raw juice on the human body.

How We Got Here

Strawberry Moon was founded in 2011 by yoga proletariat Sean Dereck, when he pressed a 3 day cleanse for a client. Said client was exhilarated with the juice and immediately brought back seven other customers. Fast forward a few years, and we have built a commercial kitchen in a garage, outgrown the garage, disassembled the garage kitchen, moved into a much larger production facility, and half-way opened a retail space on the top of Queen Anne.

Other Ways You Can Help

Choose not to make a financial contribution? Totally understandable. If you feel compelled, there are other ways to support the campaign.

  • Spread the word. Share this campaign on social media, or by word of mouth.
  • Like us on Facebook and Instagram
  • Just take care of yourself. Whether you use our juice to do that or not, get healthy. You deserve it.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, I'm making this page for a great friend of mine Donald (TJ).

Anyone that knows TJ knows what an awesome person he is. He is always trying to help anyone he can when they are in need. He is a great friend, brother, son and god father to his 2 god children. He doesnt deserve for something this cruel to have happened to him and he can use all the help he can get right now.

Here is what happened:

On July 3rd he went with his family and one of his friends to a firework show in Jackson, CA. A group of drunk kids started picking on his family and starting attacking them. TJ tried so hard to get these kids to leave his family and friends alone. Finally one of the kids TJ asked to leave took his empty alcohol bottle and swung it at him slicing above his eyebrow and puncturing his eye. 

So far, TJ has been through a 4.5 hour surgery with little hope of saving his eye, the Dr's said that if they can keep the eye alive (doubtful) he will probably never see out of it again. He will be going through more surgeries to try and keep the eye alive at least so they dont have to remove it. 

 

What We Need

We are trying to gather some money for TJ to help pay some of his hospital bills and transportation prices to get to all his follow up appointments and surgeries.

He is unable to work his roofing job right now so I am hoping he can get enough money to help him pay rent and groceries until he can start working again. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times are so hard financially to us all right now. Even 5$ would add up to greatly help TJ. 

Even if your not able to contribute, if you know TJ PLEASE share this to everyone you know! We are trying to get this by as many loving, caring, understanding and willing to help people as we can.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hello, I'm making this page for a great friend of mine Donald (TJ).
Anyone that knows TJ knows what an awesome person he is. He is always trying to help anyone he can when they are in need. He is a great friend, brother, son and god father to his 2 god children. He doesnt deserve for something this cruel to have happened to him and he can use all the help he can get right now.
Here is what happened:
On July 3rd he went with his family and one of his friends to a firework show in Jackson, CA. A group of drunk kids started picking on his family and starting attacking them. TJ tried so hard to get these kids to leave his family and friends alone. Finally one of the kids TJ asked to leave took his empty alcohol bottle and swung it at him slicing above his eyebrow and puncturing his eye. 
So far, TJ has been through a 4.5 hour surgery with little hope of saving his eye, the Dr's said that if they can keep the eye alive (doubtful) he will probably never see out of it again. He will be going through more surgeries to try and keep the eye alive at least so they dont have to remove it. 
 


What We Need
We are trying to gather some money for TJ to help pay some of his hospital bills and transportation prices to get to all his follow up appointments and surgeries.
He is unable to work his roofing job right now so I am hoping he can get enough money to help him pay rent and groceries until he can start working again. 
 


Other Ways You Can Help
I know times are so hard financially to us all right now. Even 5$ would add up to greatly help TJ. 
Even if your not able to contribute, if you know TJ PLEASE share this to everyone you know! We are trying to get this by as many loving, caring, understanding and willing to help people as we can.

story:
"Friends and Family for Annie Jones Recovery"

 

Diagnoses: Quadriplegia, Spinal Damage from a fall

 

Story

 

Annie Jones has been a proud mother and a life long leader in the Chicago land Community.  Ms. Jones was born in Mississippi, but spent her entire life in Chicago.  She raised all her kids as a single parent as well as siblings, non relatives throughout her life.  On May 12,2012, at the age of 71, she fell down an extensive amount of stairs which led to her current medical condition.  This experience has been devastating to say the least.  Despite this tragedy, Ms. Jones has suffered a lot.  Some Medicare services are not available to her through Public Aid due to not reporting accurate income as required in the early 1980's.  As a result she will not be eligible for ANY ASSISTANCE for the remainder of her life.  (NO FREE PUBLIC ASSISTANCE!!!!) 

 

 

Medical History Prior to May 12, 2012

 

Over the last 39 yrs Ms. Jones has battled the following medical conditions Diabetes, and High Blood Pressure.  She also had the following medical procedures:  1998 (Hip surgery from a car accident)  2002 ( 2 captional surgeries, right arm and left hand)  2005 (Heart valve replacement with a pacemaker)  2007 ( Thyroid surgery)  2009 (vertebrae surgery)  2010 (total left knee replacement)  and a few others. 

 

 

Family

 

Children

 

Two sons:  Harrison Jones, Harvey Jones

 

Four daughters:  Annette Jones, Audrey Jones, Vanessa Jones, Earlene Lovelace

 

Siblings:  Garrison Jones, Sherman Jones, Jeanette Jones

 

Ms Jones has a host of nieces, nephews, cousins, grandchildren, and great grandchildren.  She is the oldest of her siblings.  She's also the heart, soul, and backbone of the Jones family. 

 

In Loving Memory:  The following family members have gone on to be with the Lord:  Effie Jones (Mother)  Archie Elliot  (Father)   Juanita Brown-Jones (Daughter)  Harrison Jones Jr.,  Cornelius Jones  (Brothers)  Deborah Jones (Sister) 

 

 

 

Medical Expenses:

 

 

Ms.  A. Jones has numerous collections totaling over $25,000 and counting in medical bills alone to date.  When applying for financial assistance, responses included:  "2 co-signers needed",  "high credit score needed".  Basically in order to get any kind of assistance, you have to be a middle class working person.  Even the loan companies require a ridiculous deposit with huge financing charges which are usually attached to a denial letter.

 

 

Mission:

 

Our mission is to raise a minimum of $25,000 to make her home handicap accessible.  These features will include the following:  front and rear stair lift, front and rear ramps, van with lift,  fitness equipment for rehab purposes.  She also needs funds for ongoing medical bills, medication, and medical supplies.

 

 

Promise:

 

100% OF ALL PROCEEDS WILL BE USED FOR THE MEDICAL EXPENSES AND REHABILITATION OF ANNIE JONES.

 

 

Plea:

 

 

Please circulate this cause to caring people.  No donation is too small.  All anonymous and open donations of any amount are a true blessing and are welcome.  If everyone gives a little then we all can help A WHOLE LOT. 

 

Prayers:

 

For the recovery of Annie Jones and that she is restored to a highly functional status very soon. 

 

Special Thanks:

 

To all of you who have taken the time to help in all ways.  You are truly appreciated.  May God continue to bless each and every one of you!!
