story:
My Story

Ever wonder how you can really make a difference in the world?  Okay, I know it sounds cheesy, but this is something that's been pestering me for a while.  My name is Natalie, and I've recently been awarded a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to make some big change as a Kiva Fellow in YaoundÃ©, Cameroon... but I need your help! 


Recently, I graduated from the Monterey Institute of International Studies with a Masters in Public Administration.  For the past few years I've concentrated on learning innovative and responsible ways to tackle some of the most challenging social problems, both in the US and abroad.  A very successful and promising approach which I strongly support is microfinance.  What exactly is microfinance, you may be asking? Well, in short microfinance is a way for low income individuals, often in developing countries, to access savings, loans and other financial services (check out this nifty resource for more info).  By reducing dependence on donations or foreign aid, microfinance offers a promising way to create long-term economic security so individuals and families can create better lives for themselves.


As a Kiva Fellow, I will be dedicating four months of volunteer service to build capacity at Kiva's newest field partner in Cameroon, interview and establish relationships with new borrowers and share their stories with the international community.


Kiva's story

Kiva is one of the great innovators in microfinance.  Through its website, Kiva connects regular ole' people just like you and me to entrepreneurs and small business owners in developing countries and communities around the world.  Kiva's mission is to "connect people through lending to alleviate poverty". When you make a loan through Kiva, you contribute directly to improving an entrepreneur's economic opportunity.  Every single dollar of your loan.  Wanna know more about how it works?  Check this out! 

How Kiva Works from Kiva on Vimeo.


Fellows are at the core of Kiva's value proposition; without them, Kiva would not be able to serve such a vast array of entrepreneurs in Cameroon or the other 60 countries where it works. 


Where You Come In

With a little bit of your financial support, we can make a real impact in Cameroon.  In early February 2012, I'll embark on an epic journey across the Atlantic to serve as an unpaid volunteer, working directly with Kiva's field partner ACEP Cameroun.  It's up to me to completely fund housing, medical, travel and all other expenses for the fellowship.  Any amount donated will be influential. 


So you know exactly where your money will go, here's an abbreviated breakdown of my fellowship budget:

  • Round-trip flight, California to YaoundÃ©: $1,600
  • Single-entry visa: $230
  • Immunization (Yellow fever, malaria, hepatitis, etc.): $150
  • Training costs: $150
  • Accommodation: $350 - 500/month
  • Communication (internet and mobile phone): $300
  • Transportation (bus, taxi, bicycle, etc): $360
  • Food: $250


I've applied for a very small grant from a foundation whose generous support provides funding for international community service, so with these fundraising efforts combined I feel I can make the most of my four month fellowship.  


The best part is with your contribution you'll get a little piece of Africa for yourself (in addition to the satisfaction of donating to a worthy cause)!  Check out the different types of perks for details.  If you decide to contribute, please choose the "PayPal" option. 


I'll be posting updates about my work with Kiva and ACEP Cameroun along the way, so stay tuned to this page :)  


Also, if you'd like to know more about the Kiva Fellows program and what I'll be doing day to day, visit here. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Interested to contribute to the cause but not able to donate?  No worries!  Even the simple act of sharing this page with your friends, family or colleagues (see the options under the intro video) will make an impact.  Just click the "share" button and you can instantly connect me to a larger network of potential donors.  


Please feel free to contact me directly with any other ideas or comments on the fellowship: natalie.sherman@gmail.com


Thanks a million for your consideration and support!!

story:
Our Story

Hi my name is Baby Ava.  I am 19 months old and I was involved in a car accident on December 16, 2011, when a man on PCP struck and hit my mommy's car.  I was flown to Johns Hopkins Hospital in Baltimore, Maryland, where I am fighting for my life.


The Impact

I am suffering brain damage each second of the day, but I am a fighter.  My mommy and I were on our way to get stamps so we could mail out our Christmas cards.  We were on Coastal Highway stopped at a red light when this man high on PCP stuck the back of our car.  He was driving so fast the back of the car was pushed to the front trapping my mommy and me in our car.  They used the Jaws of Life to get us out, it took about 30 minutes.


What We Need & What You Get

We need a Christmas Miracle.  We need Prayers & lots of Prayers.  We don't live in Baltimore, we live in Selbyville, Delaware.  So if anyone could help my parents out so that they can be with me till I get better we would all appreciate it. 


Other Ways You Can Help

 And if you can't help during these hard times by a donation, could you please just say a Prayer untill I get out of the Critical Stage.  Merry Christmas to you all & God Bless to youâ™¥

story:
Hello my name is Geinner Duque i am 16 years old colombian born student-Athlete and I am part of an international club  Mid-City Lions FC out of Atlanta, Ga that gives players a platform to receive top level training, travel, and be exposed to the highest levels of competition. The primary focus of the club is to give players the opportunity to pursue their dreams of being a college and /or a professional soccer player. The trip this summer to England goes from June 9th through August 6th and would allow me to tour the universities, talk to admission officers, and showcase myself to coaches in the area.  

 
To say a little about myself i moved to the united states at the age of 5 with my mom and my little sisters. I had played on the streets of colombia with my cousins once i got here i joined an academy to play more competitive soccer. Since my young start i fell in love with the sport and decided it was my calling , i have not stopped playing since. Even though i have a passion for soccer i know that my primary obligation is attending college and continuing my education. Three years ago i joined the Mid-City Lions a club that could offer me both of my necessities. Since the age of 13 i have played 3 age groups over what my age is , i am 16 years old and playing in the age group U-19. I have matured mentally and soccer wise i have been prepared to travel outside the country to show my talent. During my time in the club my team has traveled to England and Barcelona to play in some of the most prestigious tournaments in the world yet i haven't been able to attend because of my immigration-status. This year i was able to resolve my status and am allowed to travel outside the country only once and i believe this is a great opportunity that i can not waste.
I was chosen to travel to England with a semi-pro team full of college students and players ranging from 18-23 year olds. I thank full beforehand for your support towards me and the sport.
 
My parents only have enough money to support me and my two younger sisters. I have a weekend job that pays for my soccer expenses i am saving every little money i get but i need help, any money you donate will help reach my goal all the funds will go straight to my trip.
Thank you for your time

 

 

Hola mi nombre es Geinner Duque tengo 16 años de edad nacido en Risaralda, Colombia de padres Santuareños estudiante y atleta yo soy parte de un club internacional Mid-City Lions FC de Atlanta, Ga que da a los jugadores una plataforma para recibir una formación de nivel superior, viajar y ser expuesto a los más altos niveles de competencia. El objetivo principal del club es dar a los jugadores la oportunidad de perseguir sus sueños de resibir una beca universitaria y / o ser un jugador de fútbol profesional. El viaje a Inglaterra este verano va desde 9 de junio al 6 de agosto y me permitiría visitar las universidades, hablar con los oficiales de admisión, y mostrarme a los entrenadores de la zona.
 
Para hablar un poco acerca de mí mismo me mudé a los Estados Unidos a la edad de 5 años con mi madre y mis hermanas pequeñas. Yo había jugado en las calles de santuario en  Colombia con mis primos, una vez que llegué aquí me uní a una academia para jugar fútbol más competitivo. Desde mi comienzo joven me enamoré de este deporte y decidí que era mi vocación, no he dejado de jugar desde entonces. A pesar de que tengo una pasión por el fútbol sé que mi obligación principal es asistir a la universidad y continuar mi educación. Hace tres años me uní a a este gran club llamado Mid-City lions,un club que me podría ofrecer ambas de mis necesidades. Desde los 13 años he jugado 3 grupos de edad más de lo que mi edad es, yo tengo 16 años y estoy jugando en el grupo de edad de 19 años. he madurado mental y fútbolisticamente y he estado dispuesto a viajar fuera del país para mostrar mi talento. Durante mi tiempo en el club  mi equipo ha viajado a Inglaterra y Barcelona para jugar en algunos de los torneos más prestigiosos del mundo aún no he podido asistir debido a mi estatus de inmigración. Este año tuve la oportunidad de resolver mi situación y me permite viajar fuera del país sólo una vez y creo que esta es una gran oportunidad que no puedo perder.
Fui elegido para viajar a Inglaterra con un equipo semi-profesional lleno de estudiantes universitarios y jugadores que van desde 18 hasta 23 años de edad. Doy las gracias de antemano por su completo apoyo hacia mí y el deporte.
 
Mis padres sólo tienen dinero suficiente para mantenerme a mí y a mis dos hermanas menores. Tengo un trabajo de fin de semana que me paga los gastos de fútbol , estoy ahorrando cada centavo que me gane pero necesito ayuda, cualquier dinero que usted pueda donar ayudará a alcanzar mi meta,todos los fondos irán directamente a mi viaje.
Gracias por su tiempo.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kayla and I am the live in aide to Rick who is needing compassion to help his health and get to a city where he can receive the help.  I have been a live in aide for many years to a few people and have done it as my way to contribute to the well being of others, not for a living.  I am trying to raise money to get him moved to the best medical care he can receive.  He no longer can walk much due to his back and knees which he can receive that care in repair of his back and knees in Albuquerque.  This would be a life altering change for him to live a somewhat normal life again.

What We Need & What You Get

I am trying to raise $2500 for this move.

  • $1100 for the deposit of his rental living arrangements
  • $200 for the truck rental
  • $500 for gas of the rental truck
  • $500 for those loading and unloading the truck of items
  • $200 for utility deposits

All I can offer you is my heartfelt thanks to giving a good, wonderful man at a chance at life again.

The Impact

Your contribution will make the difference in Rick's life by giving him his life back.  To me, that is the greatest gift to give is someone the chance at truly living again.

  • It is valuable to you as a person because you know you have helped a person in need.
  • I have been trying to fundraise for him to no avail on other sources like WishUponAHero.com where you have to prove yourself before you even get on the site and still did not receive any assistance.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute financially, that doesn’t mean you can’t help Rick:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about Rick's campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! Share on facebook, myspace, blogs, anywhere you can think of.

I want to thank everyone who helps in their own way...special thanks to Taunia, who brought me to this site and others with their ideas... Amy and Lori.

story:
Our Story

We are a group of colleagues from South Shore Hospital, including members of the rehabilitation and nursing departments, plus a few friends, who have joined together to run the Ragnar Relay. It will be our 3rd time running this race and we do it because there really is no other situation where you find yourself running in the middle of the night in rural New England with only a headlamp to light your way.

What is Ragnar?

Ragnar is an overnight running relay race that makes testing your limits a team sport. A team is made up of 6-12 individuals; each individual runs 3 legs. The legs of the race vary in difficulty and distance, from 3-8 miles, allowing elite and novice runners to run together. Over 2 days and 1 night, teams run 200 miles. Pair that with crazy costumes, inside jokes, and unforgettable stories. You might call it a race. We call it Ragnar.

www.ragnarrelayne.com

The Impact

Over the past 3 years, South Shore Hospital has worked to bring cancer care closer to people in our community through the programs that are provided at our Cancer Center. This year, the Ragnar race course has changed and it runs closer to the community that we serve in our daily work at the hospital. In light of this change, we have decided to step up our game this year and put our running energy and efforts at team building towards a good cause: The South Shore Hospital Campaign for Healing, Caring, and Comforting, which supports the expansion of programs including cancer care, inpatient care, outpatient orthopedic, Visiting nurse and Hospice,  all of which improve upon treatment of individuals in our community.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to fulfill our commitment to run this race as a team and together support a good cause, we need your help! We have estimated that it will cost about $200 per team member to complete this race, with costs going to van rentals, gear, food, water, etc. We are committed to giving a minimum of 25% of donations received to South Shore Hospital's Charitable Foundation for the Campaign for Healing, Caring, and Comforting. What do you get? Check out our list of perks! And please keep in mind, any donations are greatly appreciated. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you prefer to make another type of donation, such as goods (snacks, gatorade, etc.) or gear (headlamps, reflective vests), feel free to leave a comment below. Thank you for your support!

story:
“Imagine never having to rip up the couch cushions looking for your keys, or asking a friend to call you because you can’t find your phone.” 

What Is It?

The SpotLoss Fob allows you to press a button on the fob to find your phone, or a button on your phone to find your fob. Additionally, it is a proximity alert system. You can be notified by the fob or by your cellphone (or computer) if the two devices become more than 50 meters apart, or conversely come within 50 meters of each other. This would notify you that you left your keys on your desk, that your child wandered off in the mall, or that your sister is nearby. 
 
Besides an audible or vibrating alarm, you can also be notified to a change in proximity by text or email. And, since SpotLoss uses low power technology, you don't have to worry about recharging the battery weekly or monthly.

 

The SpotLoss Fob

The fob runs for roughly a year on a replaceable watch battery without having to remember to recharge it. It measures 5.6 x 3.0 x 1.5 cm and the carabiner style design allows it to quickly latch onto nearly anything. 

The fob uses a free cell phone app, and we are currently building a Software Development Kit for other software engineers that would like to hack our hardware. The fob communicates with cell phones and computers using BlueSmart which is a subsection of the Bluetooth 4.0 standard. 

 

 

 

 

 

The communication with external devices (cell phones or computers) is handled using a many-to-many relationship, meaning one fob can be connected to multiple external devices, and one external device can be connected to multiple fobs. The fob is only concerned with proximity, so it doesn't use GPS, or cell tower or WiFi locating services. This is allows SpotLoss to be less intrusive and more energy efficient. 

 

What is the money going to be used for? 

While we have written our code, designed our hardware, and built functioning prototypes, we need this Indiegogo campaign to manufacture our first large scale production run of SpotLoss fobs.

The PCBs for the fobs are being assembled locally. The carabiner exteriors are manufactured in house. 

 

Specifications

  • The range of the device is 50 meters (164 feet) and works through walls and other solids. 
  • Runs for a year on replaceable watch battery without recharging 
  • Uses a free app that allows users to easily customize settings 
  • Get texts or emails about proximity events. 
  • Works with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPad 3, iPad 4, and iPad Mini. 
  • Will work with Android Bluetooth 4.0 devices shortly. 
  • Uses Bluetooth Low Energy (a.k.a. BlueSmart) protocol so the battery use is minimal 
  • 5.6 x 3.0 x 1.5 cm carabiner style easily attaches to almost anything. 
  • Connect up to ten devices to one phone or computer at the same time. 
  • Connects with cell phones and computers in a many-to-many relationship. 
  • Fob supports vibrating and variable pitch alerts. 
  • Printed circuit boards and their enclosures will be assembled in Upstate New York 

Our Company

Our team is composed of software developers and electrical engineers and those who know a little about both. 

We believe it's about time people start utilizing what is basically a computer that they carry in their pocket for even greater purposes than talking, texting, and using Facebook. Our company looks to highlight and build on innovative uses of smart phones and their interaction with the outside world.

story:
Short Summary
Supportcp.org and this funding campaign were specifically designed to bring awareness to my son’s physical condition. Diagnosed at birth with Cerebral Palsy, Dylan spends each and every day motivated to reach his DREAM of walking and living a “Life Without Limits”. The hope is that we can reach our goal of $25,000 and provide a year’s worth of specialized assistance with physical and occupational therapy that isn’t covered by insurance.

As a parent I continue to push and encourage Dylan every day to live with confidence, pride and determination, not allowing Cerebral Palsy to affect his quality of life. My constant reminders to him are to never quit, never give up and stay strong!  I tell him that he can accomplish anything he sets his mind to; he can grow up and be whoever he wants to be. The words "I can't" are not allowed to be spoken.

Your contribution is the backbone of fulfilling Dylan’s dream of walking and improving his day-to-day activities. The importance of this campaign is beyond words. Reaching his ultimate goal of walking (unassisted) would be a colossal achievement for Dylan and a step in the right direction for continued growth.

What is CP?
Cerebral Palsy is a group of chronic conditions affecting body movement and muscle coordination. It is caused by damage to one or more specific areas of the brain, usually occurring during fetal development; before, during, or shortly after birth; or during infancy. Thus, these disorders are not caused by problems in the muscles or nerves. Instead, faulty development or damage to motor areas in the brain disrupt the brain's ability to adequately control movement and posture. It also contributes to muscle weakness and poor control.

Cerebral palsy itself is not progressive (i.e. brain damage does not get worse); however, secondary conditions, such as muscle spasticity, can develop which may get better over time, get worse, or remain the same. Although cerebral palsy is not "curable" in the accepted sense, training and therapy can help improve function.

What We Need
Our goal is to raise $25,000.00 (in 60 days) to fund a full calendar year of occupational and physical therapy sessions. Due to our nation’s current insurance restrictions and the inadequate programs offered by employers, Dylan DOES NOT receive the appropriate therapy necessary to improve and regulate his growth and fine motor skill development.

The financial effects of Cerebral Palsy on a family can be very difficult to overcome, as well as the pressures and frustration that come with it.

What You Get
By donating, you will have the opportunity to track Dylan’s progress via monthly progress reports, media galleries of his therapy sessions and detailed payment reports to the various organizations providing his occupational and physical therapy. You can feel confident that EVERY dollar donated will be used for direct services! Also, be sure to take advantage of our SUPPORTCP.ORG PERKS!  Limited availability!

If you require additional information about SupportCP or just want to follow along with Dylan’s adventures, please visit us at www.supportcp.org.

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that money can be tight and not everyone can help. If you can't donate but want to help, please pass this link along to your friends via email or share it via your social networks;

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google+
  • Tumblr
  • Reddit
  • Linkedin

Sharing with your networks will provide us an opportunity to share Dylan’s DREAM and improve awareness of the needs of a successful campaign. Thank you so much for anything you can do to help.

How Funds Will be Managed
Every dollar raised through this campaign will be used to help Dylan reach his goal of walking. This includes all therapist costs, therapy sessions and additional assistance that may be required to help him realize his DREAM.  Even though Dylan can walk and maneuver with his walker, it’s his desire to walk side by side with his twin brother that motivates his vision of a “Life Without Limits”.

Thank You
Every effort is made to push Dylan in reaching his potential, with a constant focus on “Life Without Limits”. Because of people like you and the numerous charities and organizations that work tirelessly around the clock to enrich the lives of others, no parent or child that deals with Cerebral Palsy can ever say THANK YOU enough!

Download Your FREE "Life Without Limits" Campaign Badge
This campaign badge is only available right here. Right-click the image and select Save As, or just drag it to your desktop.

Post it to Facebook, twitter, your blog or anywhere you'd like to let the world know you've joined forces with SupportCP and have helped donate to a great cause!







Follow SupportCP
During our Indiegogo funding campaign, we will share updates and videos through our Facebook and Twitter pages. Click below to follow, like and add.

You can feel confident that EVERY dollar donated will be used for direct services! Also, be sure to take advantage of our SUPPORTCP.ORG PERKS!  Limited availability! If you require additional information about SupportCP or just want to follow along with Dylan’s adventures, please visit us at www.supportcp.org.
Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand that money can be tight and not everyone can help. If you can't donate but want to help, please pass this link along to your friends via email or share it via your social networks;

Facebook
Twitter
Google+
Tumblr
Reddit
Linkedin
Sharing with your networks will provide us an opportunity to share Dylan’s DREAM and improve awareness of the needs of a successful campaign. Thank you so much for anything you can do to help.
How Funds Will be ManagedEvery dollar raised through this campaign will be used to help Dylan reach his goal of walking. This includes all therapist costs, therapy sessions and additional assistance that may be required to help him realize his DREAM.  Even though Dylan can walk and maneuver with his walker, it’s his desire to walk side by side with his twin brother that motivates his vision of a “Life Without Limits”.Thank You Every effort is made to push Dylan in reaching his potential, with a constant focus on “Life Without Limits”. Because of people like you and the numerous charities and organizations that work tirelessly around the clock to enrich the lives of others, no parent or child that deals with Cerebral Palsy can ever say THANK YOU enough!
Download Your FREE "Life Without Limits" Campaign BadgeThis campaign badge is only available right here. Right-click the image and select Save As, or just drag it to your desktop.
Post it to Facebook, twitter, your blog or anywhere you'd like to let the world know you've joined forces with SupportCP and have helped donate to a great cause!Follow SupportCPDuring our Indiegogo funding campaign, we will share updates and videos through our Facebook and Twitter pages. Click below to follow, like and add.

story:
The adoption and use of new technology designed specifically to fight malaria is crucial. If every at risk child carried with them this kind of protection, together we would bring about an incredible reduction in new Malaria cases and prevent the loss of young life. Please help us now.

Who are we?

The Butterfly Tree helps to increase awareness and raise funds to assist the fight against malaria in Zambia. The charity provides malaria prevention testing kits, mosquito nets and educational workshops in remote villages.

 

skintoskin@effjey.co.uk 

Effjey Group Ltd are the UK based owners, administrators and beneficiary for this campaign. Effjey Ltd are the UK partners for New Textiles Lda.


New Textiles Lda the product supplier is a Bio-functional textiles company and a spin off from the University of Minho Portugal. Their mission is to research, develop and bring to the healthcare sector a range of highly effective new products and technology. 

What are we asking the people of the world to fund and why?

We want to manufacture, ship and distribute free to the children of Africa an amazing new Malaria fighting T shirt.  

How does it work?

The solution applied to the skintoskin® T shirt is highly effective in repelling mosquitoes. It works by blocking the pores of the female mosquito antenna. Malaria is transmitted via a bite from an infected mosquito. The effect works 24/7 for the natural life of the garment which can be years, making the wearer invisible to the mosquito. This T shirt can be washed repeatedly and it still keeps protecting the wearer. In our trials we washed the garments up to 70 times with no loss of effect. The T shirts are 100% cotton and manufactured to last.

Permethrin is the only compound accepted in the United States by the EPA
(Environmental Protection Agency) for use in clothing and the WHO (World Health
Organisation) for protection from insect bites. The skintoskin® T shirt is permanently impregnated with Permethrin using our advanced manufacturing techniques. 

 

                

Do we know it works?  

Laboratory tests have been performed (tunnel and hand tests) by the Institute of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, Universidade Nova de Lisboa. The protocols used are recognized by the World Health Organization and demonstrated a very significant repellent effect even after the garments were washed 70 times.

                                      

The real beauty of the skintoskin® T shirt is it is so easy to apply, no creams, sprays, or lotions that can be tedious to apply, short term or just forgotten, you simply put on your T shirt. This is one of the important factors with all bio-functional clothing, it is so easy to apply plus the repellent properties are always with you where ever you go. 

Who will benefit from the technology and from a ($11) (£7.00) (€8.50) T shirt?

Textiles and clothing are something virtually every person on our planet has placed against their skin 24/7. The world fight in preventing Malaria uses many well proven tools, mosquito nets are effective I expect you have heard of these. Another highly effective and widely used tool is pesticide sprays. The skintoskin® T shirt will let children and adults take prevention with them where ever they go. It will give protection when they are not in a pesticide treated area or under a mosquito net if they are fortunate enough to have one. Areas like Zambia are remote and the net campaigns make little inroad into these areas. This T shirt is like wearing your own invisible mosquito net, where ever you go the effect is surrounding you and constantly offering proven protection from the fatal bite. The repellent effect is always there and a T shirt can last for years even as a hand me down. The T shirts come in a cool range of colours and kids love them.     

What will the funds be used for and how will we get the T shirts into Africa?

To get the T shirts into Africa we need experts in this task so we have partnered with the inspirational people at The Butterfly Tree charity. UK Charity - no. 1118084

                     http://www.thebutterflytree.org.uk/pages/ 

The Butterfly Tree NGO in Zambia is the sister organisation to The Butterfly Tree in the UK. The Non-Government Organisation was founded by Jane Kaye-Bailey in 2006 shortly after registering the UK charity. Their aim is to support rural communities decimated by health and disease issues.      

All the members are volunteers which enables donor funds to go directly into the grass root projects.

"Get the T shirts into Africa" Sounds easy but this takes time and money with many barriers to overcome, language, cultures, logistics, trust, politics to name a few. We have partnered with The Butterfly Tree organisation because they are not only raising awareness as well as fund raising in the UK and worldwide, this charity have their own team of qualified volunteers in Africa working directly with children and families affected by this devastating disease. The Butterfly Tree has an outstanding record, they are the people who have the know how and can make this final step to "Get the T shirts into Africa"

           

           Jacob a Butterfly Tree charity volunteer distributing life saving products 

The skintoskin® T shirt is a product regardless of what it is used for and like all products it needs materials, skills, manufacturing, regulating, packing, labelling, shipping, educational and support media. The administration and network that supports an operation like this needs to be in place not just for this campaign but on going so we can do this again and again. My team at Effjey UK are in place to handle this function. Effjey currently manage the distribution of skintoskin® products into the United Kingdom National Health Service including prescription services.  

What We Need & What You Get.

For this first campaign we have set the funding goal at £20,000, we hope as a first time campaign this is achievable, it would be amazing if we achieve many-many times this amount so please do not hold back.

The skintoskin® anti-insect T shirt can protect you or a loved one as well. So as a perk we will send you your own skintoskin® T shirts if you donate above the base levels. 

Every donor will be mentioned on our wall of fame.

Every donor will receive a Malaria information for travelers pdf. Supplied by Public Health England a UK Crown body. (c) copyright. Reproduced with permission of Public Health England.

All the funds raised in this first campaign will be used to produce as many skintoskin® T shirts as we can and get them delivered to our donors as perks but far more importantly delivered to the carers and aid workers on the front line in Africa via our Butterfly Tree partners. 

Other Ways You Can Help.

We really hope you can donate even if its £1 it will make a difference. Everyone that donates will have their name added to our on-line wall of fame which can be seen here

http://walloffame.yolasite.com 

We understand some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

If you can't donate please tell your friends, tweet about us, facebook us, anything that tells the world what we are trying to do.

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

Please help us achieve this. 

           

We are hoping the people of the world will come together and join hands with us to make this happen. Together we can provide long term protection and save the lives of vulnerable children, men and women who desperately need our help. 

What have we already achieved in other fields addressing issues closer to home with our innovative technology?

To meet me and see how our work in other fields is creating a buzz and recognition, please click on the following link.

http://www.ideaconnection.com/problem-solver-interviews/00344-Problem-Solver-Wins-with-a-Bacteria-Beating-Technolog.html/ 

Some hard facts. 

Malaria affects half the worlds population.

A child somewhere in the world dies every 60 seconds mainly in African nations from this dreadful disease. In the time it has taken you to read this campaign 5 children have died. This is shocking to read but it is a fact.

Malaria causes around 219 million illnesses every year.

660,000+ people die from Malaria every year.

Each year over 2000 people are diagnosed with Malaria in the USA and UK alone after international travel.

We can make a big difference. The work done by the many volunteers and organisations dedicated to this cause has reduced the death toll and infection rate by 50% over the last 10-15 years. The addition of new innovative technologies and preventative measures are crucial and will mean we can increase the pressure, take our fight deeper into the field and keep reducing the toll.

A vaccine is on the horizon but it will need to be trialled, proven safe and effective before it can be deployed fully. It is understood that even if a vaccine was available, any vaccine will only be effective in preventing malaria if it is used alongside mosquito nets, insecticide sprays and insect repellents.

It will be quite a few years before a vaccine is fully approved and in use, in the mean time children are dying needlessly at an alarming rate.

I for one cannot live with that......... 

(source www.malarianomore.co.uk ).

Check out our perk to win a stunning Vincent Basham print. When English artist Vincent heard about our campaign he asked if there was any way he could help. Vincent's sea scape paintings are breath taking. To be in with a chance to win this incredible artwork simply donate £25. Each donor will also receive a skintoskin® insect repellent T shirt plus entry into the prize draw. The winner will be drawn at the end of this campaign.

Hazy Sunset a work in oils by Vincent Basham. Size 760mm x 760mm limited edition print. Number 12 of 195.

See more stunning Vincent Basham paintings here

http://vincentbasham.co.uk/index.html

story: Skyler was born with a congenital heart defect.  Double Right Outlet Ventricle Pulmonary Stenosis Dextra Cardio.  Easier terms...Skyler was born with only 3 chambers and his heart was on the opposite side of his chest.  He underwent 3 open heart surgeries prior to age 4.  By the age of 5 he was having difficulties with oxygen levels, constant fever and coughing issues and a cloudy substance on his lungs via xrays.  These were misdiagnosed at phemonia and asthma.  In May of 2013 he was taken once again to Arkansas Childrens Hospital on a Saturday.  By that evening he was diagnosed with Plastic Bronchitis.  A rare disease that affects less than .5% of children that have undergone a Fontane Heart Surgery.  There is a chemical that the heart sends to the lungs to allow the mucus to break up and leave the lung area allowing the bronchial tree to release oxygen to the different areas in the body.  There is no know cure for this rare disease, so by the following Tuesday morning, the doctors decided that Skyler's only chance would be to receive a new heart in hopes that the chemical issue would resolve.  Skyler was placed on the National Transplant List within 3 days after all the testing was completed.  There at ACH is where Skyler and his family waited for 5 months before receiving a heart.  The surgery was very long but successful but with a foreign object in your body, you are open up to other possible issues.  Since this Skyler has has some issues with viruses and low white blood cells and low red blood cells counts.  The doctors are watching him closely and monitoring and adjusting his medications to try to get him on the right track.  His mother has not been able to work the last 13 months to take care of him, homeschool, and make many 3 hour trips to see his heart doctors.  Times are very difficult and any monetary donations would be greatly appreciated.  Prayers are very welcomed also.  Thank you and God Bless!!!

story:
“One of the hottest applications of acupuncture”

“The slender wand rotates with gentle, soothing motion to promote lymphatic drainage while smoothing and tightening the eye area, cheeks, and neck”

“We saw instant lift after the first treatment”

“My internal energy feels much more balanced”

"I was blown away"

- Bobbi Brown, CCO Bobbi Brown Cosmetics

 

"My Personal use of Touch + Glow™ confirms that it keeps your face looking younger."

- Diane Kraus, M.D.

The Touch + Glow System combines the power of acupressure with magnetized therapy, gentle vibration, and Germanium to produce a brighter, tighter, youthful look and feel.

  • Acupressure stimulates internal energy at the local site and throughout the body via energetic pathways corresponding to each point.
    • Better circulation allows toxins to be flushed more quickly and also enables more nutrients to reach the layers of tissue that need them to produce healthy new tissue skin.
    • Proper lymphatic drainage reduces fluid retention that can cause puffiness.
  • Magnetism further enhances circulation, improves moisture retention, and activates tissue to firm and tone loose skin and deeper layers.
  • Germanium is a precious metal with semi-conductive and anti-oxidant properties. Germanium balances the skin’s bio-electrical field by absorbing the harmful positively charged ions that can damage healthy tissue.
  • Easy to use
  • Helps tighten skin
  • Helps smooth wrinkles
  • Helps ease stress and tension
  • Improves overall health and wellbeing
  • Provides immediate benefits
  • Long lasting results
  • No messy products or prep required
  • Portable
  • Lacks harmful side effects
  • Appropriate for both women and men

No matter how small or large, your contribution counts.

To explore market interest and evaluate user feedback, a limited run of Touch + Glow kits were produced in 2015. Rave reviews from consumers and press earned Touch + Glow instant success and notoriety. With continued interest from conglomerates, we are now seeking capital needed to validate our product and fulfill growing consumer demand.

“About 59 million Americans spend money out-of-pocket on complementary health approaches, and their total spending adds up to $30.2 billion a year.”

- National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

1. Clinical trials

Touch + Glow is more than just a beauty treatment. It’s a unique and innovative body, mind, spirit approach to looking and feeling your best. According to the National Institute of Health (NIH) and the NCCIH, clinical trials using innovative study designs to assess complementary health approaches and their integration into health care are one of the top scientific priorities. In order to quantify our positive feedback from Touch + Glow we intend to test our product utilizing objective outcome measures.

2. Refinement and expansion of our Touch + Glow jewel tool

Based on learnings from clinical trial results, it is our intention to expand our product line beginning with our new jewel tool.

3. Production of our Touch + Glow jewel tool

Shellie Goldstein, M.S., L.Ac.

CEO of Shellie Goldstein Acupuncture, PC
and Touch + Glow, Inc

Colette Roy

CFO of Shellie Goldstein Acupuncture, PC
and Touch + Glow, Inc

Audrey T. Greenfield, M.D.

Project Development
Clinical Research

Cathy Goldstein, A.P.

Industrial Designer

Ran Berkman

Online Marketing and Advertising

Barb Westfield

Strategic Sales and Marketing

Georgia Blake

Media Production

Denise Shugerman

Manufacturing Liaison

Elliot Shugerman

Engineer

Marisa Anaya, M.S., L.Ac., MSTOM

Beta Test Liaison

Marcy Gordon M.S., L.Ac., MSTOM

Beta Test Liaison

Daniela Turley, AHG, MCPP

Beta Test Liaison

Lisa Tien

Web Development Consultant

What is the Touch + Glow system?

The Touch + Glow system consists of an enhanced acupressure device (“wand”) along with a specific sequence of points to reboot face and body. An easy-to-follow instruction page and video is included and can also be downloaded on your phone, iPad, or computer.

What is the Touch + Glow wand? And how does it work?

The Touch + Glow wand is a battery-powered device for performing enhanced acupressure. Although acupressure is traditionally performed manually (with hands or fingers), the Touch + Glow wand stimulates each point more precisely and with additional benefits. The wand contains Germanium, a rare metal with unique material properties that amplify the effects of stimulation when applied to specific points. Gentle vibrations combine with magnetism and the power of acupressure to produce a brighter, healthier complexion with added health benefits.

How long does it take to see a difference?

When Touch + Glow is used according to the simple instructions, results can be seen (and felt!) immediately. A vibrant, glowing complexion is noticeable after each use of Touch + Glow, and the results are cumulative. With consistent, continued practice for 30 consecutive days, the system will yield long-lasting results including toned, tightened, invigorated skin, a reduction in the appearance of fine lines, and an overall improvement in general health and well-being.

Do I need to do the regimen everyday?

For best results, follow the protocol for 30 consecutive days. After this initial period, use 2 or 3 times per week and on special occasions when you want to look great (and feel great too)!

Will the results go away if I stop using Touch + Glow?

Touch + Glow is like taking your face to the gym. Once you are satisfied with the results of your treatments you can maintain it by repeating 2-3 times a week and anytime you would like a facial “tune up.”

Should I use Touch + Glow in the morning or at night?

Use Touch + Glow whenever is most convenient. No need to remove make-up before use, so you can even keep a pair of wands in your desk at work for an easy recharge at the end of the day or as a soothing break instead of coffee.

What happens if I miss a day or two?

For optimal results follow the Touch + Glow regimen on a daily basis. If you miss a day or two, don’t worry - just keep going.

How accurate do I need to be to see results?

The face map and instructions found in the kit have very simple diagrams and instructions to follow along with. You can also watch and follow the Touch + Glow instruction video.

How long does it take to follow the regimen?

Initially it may take 10 to 12 minutes for each side of the face for the full regimen. As you get more familiar with the routine, the time will decrease to about 6 minutes for each side of the face. Using two wands at the same time (one on each side of the face) reduces the treatment time by half. When Touch + Glow users discover how easy it is to use one wand, they often decide to get another wand to treat both sides of the face at once.

Are there any contraindications for using Touch + Glow?

Although there are no contraindications for using Touch + Glow, it is always advisable to inform your physician about any treatment that you are doing. That said, most doctors know about the positive effects of acupressure to treat stress and many other medical conditions. Indeed, the actions of Touch + Glow are based on many of the same principles that modern medicine uses to promote healing.

Can I use Touch + Glow if I’m pregnant?

Eastern medicine is all about maintaining balance—and acupressure can be an excellent way to regulate some of the dramatic hormonal fluctuations that occur during pregnancy. When pregnant, it is important to apply Touch + Glow only to the face and neck as described in the protocol. Please avoid stimulating points other than those outlined in the instructions unless under the care of a physician or a licensed acupuncturist. It is always advisable to consult your physician prior to using the Touch + Glow system.

What is the advantage of using 2 wands at once?

Using 2 wands at once cuts the treatment time in half. Most users find that treating both sides of the face together is twice as enjoyable.

What makes Touch + Glow different from other beauty tools?

Most beauty tools are designed to either enhance product penetration (generally products sold by the beauty tool manufacturer), or simply stimulate superficial circulation. The Touch + Glow system combines the principles of acupressure to address the external appearance and internal health and well being.
story_txt:
“One of the hottest applications of acupuncture”



“The slender wand rotates with gentle, soothing motion to promote lymphatic drainage while smoothing and tightening the eye area, cheeks, and neck”



“We saw instant lift after the first treatment”



“My internal energy feels much more balanced”

 "I was blown away" 
- Bobbi Brown, CCO Bobbi Brown Cosmetics
 
"My Personal use of Touch + Glow™ confirms that it keeps your face looking younger." 
- Diane Kraus, M.D.
 The Touch + Glow System combines the power of acupressure with magnetized therapy, gentle vibration, and Germanium to produce a brighter, tighter, youthful look and feel. 
Acupressure stimulates internal energy at the local site and throughout the body via energetic pathways corresponding to each point.
Better circulation allows toxins to be flushed more quickly and also enables more nutrients to reach the layers of tissue that need them to produce healthy new tissue skin.
Proper lymphatic drainage reduces fluid retention that can cause puffiness.


Magnetism further enhances circulation, improves moisture retention, and activates tissue to firm and tone loose skin and deeper layers.
Germanium is a precious metal with semi-conductive and anti-oxidant properties. Germanium balances the skin’s bio-electrical field by absorbing the harmful positively charged ions that can damage healthy tissue.
     
Easy to use
Helps tighten skin
Helps smooth wrinkles
Helps ease stress and tension
Improves overall health and wellbeing
Provides immediate benefits
Long lasting results
No messy products or prep required
Portable
Lacks harmful side effects
Appropriate for both women and men
 No matter how small or large, your contribution counts.  To explore market interest and evaluate user feedback, a limited run of Touch + Glow kits were produced in 2015. Rave reviews from consumers and press earned Touch + Glow instant success and notoriety. With continued interest from conglomerates, we are now seeking capital needed to validate our product and fulfill growing consumer demand. “About 59 million Americans spend money out-of-pocket on complementary health approaches, and their total spending adds up to $30.2 billion a year.”

- National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
1. Clinical trials
Touch + Glow is more than just a beauty treatment. It’s a unique and innovative body, mind, spirit approach to looking and feeling your best. According to the National Institute of Health (NIH) and the NCCIH, clinical trials using innovative study designs to assess complementary health approaches and their integration into health care are one of the top scientific priorities. In order to quantify our positive feedback from Touch + Glow we intend to test our product utilizing objective outcome measures.
2. Refinement and expansion of our Touch + Glow jewel tool
Based on learnings from clinical trial results, it is our intention to expand our product line beginning with our new jewel tool.
3. Production of our Touch + Glow jewel tool
     


Shellie Goldstein, M.S., L.Ac.
CEO of Shellie Goldstein Acupuncture, PCand Touch + Glow, Inc




Colette Roy
CFO of Shellie Goldstein Acupuncture, PCand Touch + Glow, Inc






Audrey T. Greenfield, M.D.
Project DevelopmentClinical Research




Cathy Goldstein, A.P.
Industrial Designer






Ran Berkman
Online Marketing and Advertising




Barb Westfield
Strategic Sales and Marketing






Georgia Blake
Media Production




Denise Shugerman
Manufacturing Liaison






Elliot Shugerman
Engineer




Marisa Anaya, M.S., L.Ac., MSTOM
Beta Test Liaison






Marcy Gordon M.S., L.Ac., MSTOM 
Beta Test Liaison




Daniela Turley, AHG, MCPP
Beta Test Liaison






Lisa Tien
Web Development Consultant

 
   
 

What is the Touch + Glow system?



The Touch + Glow system consists of an enhanced acupressure device (“wand”) along with a specific sequence of points to reboot face and body. An easy-to-follow instruction page and video is included and can also be downloaded on your phone, iPad, or computer.



What is the Touch + Glow wand? And how does it work?



The Touch + Glow wand is a battery-powered device for performing enhanced acupressure. Although acupressure is traditionally performed manually (with hands or fingers), the Touch + Glow wand stimulates each point more precisely and with additional benefits. The wand contains Germanium, a rare metal with unique material properties that amplify the effects of stimulation when applied to specific points. Gentle vibrations combine with magnetism and the power of acupressure to produce a brighter, healthier complexion with added health benefits.



How long does it take to see a difference?



When Touch + Glow is used according to the simple instructions, results can be seen (and felt!) immediately. A vibrant, glowing complexion is noticeable after each use of Touch + Glow, and the results are cumulative. With consistent, continued practice for 30 consecutive days, the system will yield long-lasting results including toned, tightened, invigorated skin, a reduction in the appearance of fine lines, and an overall improvement in general health and well-being.



Do I need to do the regimen everyday?



For best results, follow the protocol for 30 consecutive days. After this initial period, use 2 or 3 times per week and on special occasions when you want to look great (and feel great too)!



Will the results go away if I stop using Touch + Glow?



Touch + Glow is like taking your face to the gym. Once you are satisfied with the results of your treatments you can maintain it by repeating 2-3 times a week and anytime you would like a facial “tune up.”



Should I use Touch + Glow in the morning or at night?



Use Touch + Glow whenever is most convenient. No need to remove make-up before use, so you can even keep a pair of wands in your desk at work for an easy recharge at the end of the day or as a soothing break instead of coffee.



What happens if I miss a day or two?



For optimal results follow the Touch + Glow regimen on a daily basis. If you miss a day or two, don’t worry - just keep going.



How accurate do I need to be to see results?



The face map and instructions found in the kit have very simple diagrams and instructions to follow along with. You can also watch and follow the Touch + Glow instruction video.



How long does it take to follow the regimen?



Initially it may take 10 to 12 minutes for each side of the face for the full regimen. As you get more familiar with the routine, the time will decrease to about 6 minutes for each side of the face. Using two wands at the same time (one on each side of the face) reduces the treatment time by half. When Touch + Glow users discover how easy it is to use one wand, they often decide to get another wand to treat both sides of the face at once.



Are there any contraindications for using Touch + Glow?



Although there are no contraindications for using Touch + Glow, it is always advisable to inform your physician about any treatment that you are doing. That said, most doctors know about the positive effects of acupressure to treat stress and many other medical conditions. Indeed, the actions of Touch + Glow are based on many of the same principles that modern medicine uses to promote healing.



Can I use Touch + Glow if I’m pregnant?



Eastern medicine is all about maintaining balance—and acupressure can be an excellent way to regulate some of the dramatic hormonal fluctuations that occur during pregnancy. When pregnant, it is important to apply Touch + Glow only to the face and neck as described in the protocol. Please avoid stimulating points other than those outlined in the instructions unless under the care of a physician or a licensed acupuncturist. It is always advisable to consult your physician prior to using the Touch + Glow system.



What is the advantage of using 2 wands at once?



Using 2 wands at once cuts the treatment time in half. Most users find that treating both sides of the face together is twice as enjoyable.



What makes Touch + Glow different from other beauty tools?



Most beauty tools are designed to either enhance product penetration (generally products sold by the beauty tool manufacturer), or simply stimulate superficial circulation. The Touch + Glow system combines the principles of acupressure to address the external appearance and internal health and well being.

story:
What expert thinks

1.  Can’t I just use scotch tape or duct tape and obtain the same results?

 
 

2.  If I get congestion while I’m asleep, won’t Godsumm prevent me from being able to breathe?

 

3. Why is Godsumm so expensive?

 
 

4. How is it possible for such a simple product to realign facial symmetry and fix chronic bad posture?

 
 

5. Do you have any case studies or clinical trials that you can cite as evidence?

 

 

 
 

 

A while back, I was diagnosed with sleep apnea and for years I was unable to get a single good nights worth of sleep. This placed a physical and mental toll on my body and I didn't know what to do. During this period of time, I even noticed that there were even physical changes in my facial structure. My face became elongated, my lips no longer naturally curved up, my cheeks were beginning to sag, and I was showing early symptoms of dropped head syndrome (DHS). 

All of the doctors and specialists that I went to recommended surgical treatments, but it contradicted with what I learned in dental school. The surgeries that they were pushing me to receive were only temporary fixes. I knew that after a few months, these symptoms would come back. And so, I decided to take matters into my own hands. 

I discovered that gravitational pull can throw your body out of its natural state of equilibrium and have a negatively impact on your body. Over time, your jaw can gradually be pulled down and your head can start to droop. Human behavior like staring at smartphones only makes this worse. Eventually, you can develop what is called a forward head posture. Maintaining forward head posture can strain the muscles of the neck and back, leading to pain and even worse posture. 

As the jaw continues to drop, your airways will become restricted and this is how snoring other sleep-related or everyday life issues can develop.

With this knowledge, I spent what little time and energy I had leftover to create GODSUMM. With my background in dentistry and mechanical engineering, I developed a blend of materials that would counteract the negative effects of gravity and to finally help me sleep in peace again. 

And I did it. I used the prototype versions of GODSUMM on myself and received remarkable results. My sleep apnea was gone, my snoring disappeared, my facial features were restored, and I regained my proper posture! The image on the left is what I looked like before and the image on the right is what I looked like after a couple of months of care with the GODSUMM.

I then began to use the GODSUMM on my patients and even discovered that it naturally assisted in teeth realignment. As a result, the number of tooth extraction procedures I had to perform dropped drastically over the years.

 

Snoring is the first symptom that can develop into more serious medical issues.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

GODSUMM combines medical and mechanical engineering techniques to prevent snoring and teeth grinding, correct cervical posture, and gradually over time reconstruct facial symmetry.

While other tapes and strips can be crudely placed on the face, GODSUMM has been designed to be applied to strategic points on the face to create maximum effects. Our strips gently press the lips together and hold up your jaw by keeping the tongue pressed up against the roof of your mouth, give just the right amount of mouth flexibility (in case you want to talk, drink, or chew), and opens up your nasal passages for optimal breathing. Gradually you will see GODSUMM work its magic as it restores the physical integrity of your face, head, and body.

With GODSUMM's trademark secret, the blend of construction and adhesive materials. it's finally time to say goodbye to snoring, teeth grinding, bad posture, sleep apnea, and more!    

 

This is an X-ray image of one of my male patients who used GODSUMM for 4 years.

He is a very old man (80 years old). You're probably younger than him.

You will obtain even better results than him by using GODSUMM.

Let's compare the change of the skull structure before and after.

 

Recovery of the skull structure
means that the airways, nasal septum, etc. have been restored.

The overnight effects are only the beginning of what GODSUMM can do for you.

 

The male patient shown above participated in our clinical trials for the initial prototype of GODSUMM. This man came to us with symptoms of forward head posture, distorted facial structure (as seen on the initial x-ray), and various sleep issues that occurred because of those two issues. 

After using GODSUMM, this participant felt immediate effects and notified us that he no longer had a dry mouth in the morning, his sore throat disappeared, and the cold sores he usually had were no longer there. 

After several months, we witnessed his posture slowly improving and he stated that his cervical pain was reduced dramatically. After the end of the trial, his posture was corrected (left image) and his facial symmetry was realigned (right image). All of this was done without any surgical procedures!

We attempted this trial with many more participants and received similar results from almost everyone who participated. By simply bringing the jaw to its correct position during sleep and opening the airway passages, the body was brought back to a state of equilibrium and the evidence clearly showed GODSUMM works!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

By keeping the lips pressed together and the jaws closed, contracted airways will naturally reopen, snoring will be prevented, mouth breathing habits will be eliminated, and side effects of nasal breathing will be reduced. All of these benefits will compound when used long-term.

During use, the lips will not dry out, airborne bacteria and viruses will be filtered out, increase in oxygen flow to the brain and lungs to allow for deep sleep. It can also reduce the number of trips to the bathroom at night.

 

 

 

Teeth grinding can reduce the quality of sleep and can cause you to be drowsy even after you’ve slept for long hours. With GODSUMM, the tongue is gently pressed against the roof of the mouth and the lips are pressed together to prevent these negative effects.

 

 


We know that good sleep is key to having a good day. All of the symptoms that GODSUMM is meant to care is meant to drastically increase your sleep quality. Whether it's snoring, sleep apnea, or bathroom trips, GODSUMM has your back!

 

As we mentioned previously, the first prototypes of GODSUMM were used in clinical trials. To our surprise, we discovered that over time, our strips helped restore facial symmetry. The male participant above (x-ray shots) started using our tapes in 2013 and by 2017 the difference was clear!

 


For all you mouth breathers, you probably have a really bad case of cotton mouth in the morning. This happens because as your breathe, the air that passes through your mouth removes all the moisture. GODSUMM will keep your mouth closed and after a couple of months you'll notice that your mouth will stay closed without the help of GODSUMM! This because your jaws will redevelop the habit of staying together even when you're sleeping.

 

 

The picture on the left is a participant in the clinical trial that had the "head forward posture" mentioned above. Without the need of chiropractic treatment or surgery, his posture was naturally corrected simply by using GODSUMM!

 

 

Our nasal passages are natural filters against various forms of bacteria and viruses that can cause infections. Breathing through your mouth for hours as you sleep gets rid of this natural defense system. GODSUMM ensures nose breathing throughout the night so that the mucus membranes in your nose work vigorously to exert antimicrobial and antibiotic cells to strengthen your immune system.

 

 

As GODSUMM promotes nasal breathing, more oxygen is supplied to the lungs and the brain, which stimulates blood circulation throughout the body. This helps to reduce muscle cramping and prevents the bladder from shrinking during sleep. 

 

 

Pain that originates in the jaw and the joints can become worse if you sleep with your mouth open because it gives your jaws more room to move throughout the night. For those with jaw or jaw joint pain, because GODSUMM gently holds your jaw together and prevents you from sleeping with your mouth wide open, you can minimize the pain that occurs within this region. 
 
 

 

 

 

The lips are pressed together and the lower jaw is pulled up to close the mouth. As a result, the airways are widened which prevents snoring and allows you to sleep deeply. This simple act of keeping the jaw gently pressed together will also provide long term benefits mentioned above!

 

 

 

  

 

 

 
 
 
Mouth Breathers during sleep
For mouth breathers, as you’re sleeping, dust and germs combine together with the air in your mouth, which can pollute various organs and cells to ultimately weaken your immune system.
  
 
Nose Breathers during sleep

For nose breathers, there is a reduction in the influx of bacteria and viruses as you sleep and simultaneously protects the lungs through sterilizing, humidifying and dehumidifying functions. This will ultimately strengthen your immune system and helps to supply more oxygen throughout your body.

 

 

 

 
 
 

When breathing through the nose, the mucus and nose hairs initially filter out harmful substances from the air entering the nostrils. The aspirated air slowly escapes through the winding, narrow passage of the nose, helping the lungs extract a lot of oxygen. In addition, distorted airways are reopened, which prevents snoring and also strengthens the immune system.

 

 

 
 

 

     
 
 
 

I was able to sleep deeply after using this product! – Gabrielle Mosbe

 

After my husband started using the GODSUMM I noticed a clear drop in his snoring levels. I definitely recommend this amazing product to everyone! – Kara M.

 

Since I can use it right before I go to bed it wasn’t uncomfortable and after a short time I didn’t even notice I had it on. I ended up adjusting quickly and slept great! – Eliza Ogde.

 

I finally realized why people said nasal breathing was beneficial to my health. After I woke up I felt energized and even realized that I had no morning breath! - Zack Williams

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

    

 

 

 

 

GODSUMM is a product that is the culmination of our experience and research. I am a dentist with a degree in mechanical engineering and have personally experienced the negative effects of snoring, sleep apnea, teeth grinding, excessive nighttime bathroom trips, and jaw joint pain.

I have tried various products on the market but was not been able to find a solution that could bring about tangible and long lasting results so I developed a product to help those who have suffered what I have gone through.

One instance that greatly motivated my drive to bring GODSUMM to life was when one of our participants notified us that he no longer had panic attacks during the night as he slept. His doctor discovered that his restricted airways limited the amount of oxygen that he was receiving and that triggered his night time panic attacks. With GODSUMM, he was able to sleep soundly and I was able to clearly see that this was something that more people needed access to!

At the request of my patients at my dental clinic, I began to conduct years of research and finally developed GODSUMM, the product that will help you obtain the best sleep possible.

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using GODSUMM after applying enough lotion or cream depending on your skin type.

If you notice initially that the GODSUMM has fallen off in the morning, it’s probably because of the shape of your face. This is completely fine. Your face will adjust to GODSUMM after repeated use and you will notice the effects not long after.

If you have a thick beard, we recommend shaving it and then using GODSUMM.

story:
We are a group of tech camp students, attending game development camp. This story was not without a hitch however. Our amazingly knowledgeable (and sleepy) instructor; "Oak" (his true name is Brandon)  is sadly suffering from narcolepsy. This leads our dignified teacher to sleep during our classes, after instructing us. To make his floor naps more comfortable, we decided to buy him a high quality pillow. Being the kind students we are, we just couldn't stand for this poor soul to go sleeping on the floor, pillowless. Please donate to the: "Buy Oak A Pillow Foundation". The money raised above our current goal will also go to the: "Fund Oaks First-ish Game, Because He Still Wants To Make It Foundation". Please back this urgent project today!!!!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1977607830/the-glerp-invade-tower-defense-with-platforming-fl?ref=nav_search

story:
What is Toledo Quidditch?

The Toledo Firebolts Club Quidditch Team represents The University of Toledo in intercollegiate competition. We were founded in the Summer of 2012, and played our fist match against our rivals BGSU. We have since then played in many matches and tournaments, including participating in the Midwest Regional Championship, hosting the Glass City Quidditch Classic, and World Cup VI. We have also participated in quidditch history, having hosted and played in the first ever televised quidditch match in the history of the sport. We have televised games against BGSU on two separate occasions, as well as, televising the semi-finals and the finals of the Glass City Quidditch Classic.

Our goal is to travel to and play in World Cup VII in Myrtle Beach, SC. The Toledo Firebolts qualified for World Cup VII at Midwest Regionals in October.

Every donation you contribute helps us out in the long run. We would be representing our school, our city and our state in South Carolina, and every donation counts!

Want to know more?

http://www.toledofirebolts.com
http://www.facebook.com/ToledoFireboltsQuidditch
http://www.internationalquidditch.org/


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is 1000, but we will need more than that! We would like to get as much as we can so that we have to pay as little as possible out of pocket, this is going to be our biggest trip  of our teams career!

All of your donations will go to transportation and hotel prices. We are going to make sure that we are travelling as light and as cost efficient as possible, because we want to make every donation count! 

The perks are listed to the side for you to enjoy! GET THIS! The MORE you donate, the MORE stuff you get!

The Impact

Every donation helps each player to keep the cost as low as possible. 

Getting us to World Cup can help with future player recruitment! If we do well, it reflects well on our school, community, and it helps our program grow!

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE this page as much as possible! even if you can't donate right now it doesn't mean you can't help us to get to World Cup!

Every donation goes a long way! We really want to make this happen, and you can help us make it happen! Make this trip become a reality!

story: We’ve made the most comfortable pet calorie and activity trackers on the market. Poof is customizable pet and allows you to track their physical activity, food intake, calories burned and sleep quality from an easy to use free app. Poof enables pets to “have a voice.” With Poof, pet parents are more empowered with data about their pets’ daily habits, so they can better monitor their well-being and develop healthy routines, as well as detect when something might not be quite right. As the smallest trackers on the market, the Pea weighs in at .25 oz, about the size of a quarter and the Bean is .07 oz, the size of a pill. The Pea and Bean also have a long battery life and are waterproof. Available in 4 colors.

story:
Angel Maria Ruiz

Little Angel Maria has been a miricle. She was born with a lot of medical conditions that are going to require life long care. Her Condition is so rare that most doctors will never have a patient with KFS. Part of her care requires us to travel to Denver Colorado. We have a trip coming up November 11th, the reason for this fundraiser. She has had a lot of issues and complications that has required a lot of care in the past few weeks. We have already taken her to Denver in October and I have had to take a few days off of work to do it and it has become financialy difficult for us. I'm afraid if we don't raise the funds, we will not be able to take her.

What We Need 

Here are a few expenses that we pay for:

  • Fuel - I need to travel from Albuquerque to Denver. 900 miles round trip
  • Meals - We purchase a few snacks and eat out. It comes out to about $150
  • Any donation you can make is very well appreciated. McDonalds for every meal during the three days is hard to swallow.

Making a Less Stressful Trip

My little Angel gets a lot of anxiety when we travel to Denver. She has experienced some aweful proceedures and had to spend Halloween there last year because of a surgery. If we are able to take her out to do something a little fun it helps take the anxiety away. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Little Angel was born with:

    • Klippel-Feil Syndrome
    • Abnormal Vertabrea
    • Scoliosis
    • Spina Bifida
    • Tethered Spinal Cord
    • Absent Ribs
    • Fused Ribs
    • Absent Right Kidney
    • Herniated Liver
    • Underdeveloped Right Lung
    • Underdeveloped Right Leg and Foot
    She is going to need plenty of procedures and surgeries through out her young life. We are preparing for spine surgery, her fifth surgery. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute and I understand that, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Share this campaign on all your social media sites!
    • Say a prayer for Angel Maria!

    And that's all there is to it.

story:
Paulina was born with Maffuci syndrome, a disease that causes several problems on the bone structure, causing deformations and pain to the patients.

She has been through at least 20 surgeries and rehab procedures. Now she is starting to have more complications.

Today she is having one of the hardest moments of the disease and has lost her smile again.


Would you like to help her recover that beautiful smile?


We are raising money to give her a trip to Disneyland with her mother, so she can feel better knowing there's love around and get better.

Our challenge...

Her family and friends are raising money and love messages. We want to raise $2000 USD for her to go and have a good time. She has been a real fighter and an example for all of us. She deserves it.

Please help us with:

- Sharing this site with friends and family via facebook, twitter, etc.
- Send a dollar. The cost of your morning coffee, the cost of a pack of cigarretes or a soda.
- You can also send her cheering messages in here, in facebook or twitter with #smilepaulina and/or #sonriepaulina

Thank you!

Margarita and Lili (Family and friends of Paulina)

For more information about Mafucci syndrome, please go to:

http://ghr.nlm.nih.gov/condition/maffucci-syndrome

story:
Short Summary

I am Layla aka ‘Acres Wild’ and live in a small village with my partner and infant in Herefordshire. 

Through an interest in nature, self-sufficiency and the well being of our daughter I became interested in foraging, and through our inability to find affordable, natural skin care products I embarked on making my own.  

In these embryonic stages I am concentrating on getting my fully developed lip balms out into the market, the balms are created with wonderfully therapeutic wild plants including, plantain, cleavers, yarrow & comfrey and to scent the balms, meadowsweet, linden blossom, rose, lavender and mint.  

The lovely thing is that you may well of happened upon many of these plants while walking in the beautiful English countryside, even if you don't recognise them yet! 

We will not be limiting our range, in the future I fully intend to develop a number of wonderful products also created from foraged plants including a moisturising whip, facial scrub, nail oil and moustache wax for men folk. So do look out for us.

In keeping with our ethical theme all of the beeswax and honey included in the products is sourced from local hives where the bees feed on pollen from plants that have not been fed with chemicals or pesticides.

Our sustainable eco tubes are the only innovatively designed push up paper tubes on the market (not unlike popsicles, if you remember them!) and are recyclable or will decompose in your garden compost in 2 weeks. They also hold 6ml of balm as opposed to the average un-sustainable tube, which only holds 4.5ml, and are very tactile and aesthetically pleasing.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Upon receiving my full goal the funds will contribute towards the evolution of my product - notably for branding and finances towards the first compostable packing order, which is inherent to the ideals of Acres Wild.  Adding to this I will further develop distribution strategies and new product lines.  All of this will contribute to creating a sustainable future for our family.

Now to the perks, I know how much everyone loves a token of appreciation for contributing so we will create some fantastic gifts heaped full of love and thanks, these include luscious foraged lip balms, virtual hugs, moisturising whips and prints and originals of Acres Wild art (http://acreswildblog.wordpress.com/) for all you lovely people that contribute to our campaign.

I hope you feel you can facilitate this ethical cottage industry; I cannot do it without you!

 

The Impact

Acres Wild's products are completely ecologically sound, there is absolutely nothing artificial in our whips, balms and oils, and also none of our products contain water, which increases the shelf life of chemical free products by at least 6 months.  

The foraged goods will be plucked responsibly (by experienced foragers) so there is no chance of depleting natural wild flora in the British Isles.  I use certified organic hemp seed oil from a farm in Devon, this super oil if applied regularly to the skin will improve dryness, eczema & psoriasis, it is also reputed to reduce irritation caused by nappy rash, cradle cap and UV damage.

The shea & cacao butters are wild-crafted/ certified organic and sourced from small fair-trade communities and the few essential oils used are sourced from small scale producers in the British Isles and are certified organic or grown without the use of pesticides and chemicals.

We intend to heighten and de mystify the public awareness of simply crafted, foraged, indigenous, and purely natural products.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I am aware that not everyone is in the fortunate position contribute financially, however please tell your friends about Acres Wild, spread the word through facebook and twitter if possible, help me make this ethical venture a success.  

We will also be looking for appropriate retailers to stock our range in the UK so if you  like what you see please contact me; Layla for further details.

Thank you x

(from Herefordshire).

story:
My name is Kelly Turner and I am the President of Helping Hands a group dedicated to helping families and children in medical or domestic crisis situatins. Nick is a 17 year old grade 11 student who was born with a congenital disease in which he lacks the enzyme needed to break down starch and sugar. He suffers excruciating abdominal pain everytime he tries to eat and his diet is extremely limited. As a result he suffers from malnutrition and is in constant pain. The medication used to treat his condition is $12,000.00 a year and is not covered by any drug plan. His familiy fears for his deteriorating health as he has been off the medication Sucraid for 9 months now resulting in the loss of 40 pounds. At 6 foot 3 he now weighs only 149 pounds. Nicks' family has had to order the medication from the US up until now but even if it becomes available in Canada it is still a huge financial burden to this family. Please help us help Nick. He just wants to be able to do all the things that other regular 17 year olds do like attend school and play basketball. From all of us at Helping Hands and on behalf of Nick and his family I thank you

Sincerely, Kelly

story:
In late March, Bryan Wilmoth suffered a series of strokes as the result of complications from many years on HIV/AIDS medication. His doctors are confident that he is on his way to a full recovery, however the road will certainly be difficult. 

Our intention is to raise enough funds to cover Bryan's cost of living for 3 months to lessen his financial stresses and allow him to concentrate fully on his recovery. We feel blessed to be able to help someone who has done so much for others over the years. 

Any donations are greatly appreciated.

 

Much love, 

The Wilmoth Family
